title: Backend Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 As a Backend Software Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Strong professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Mobile SDK development experience


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Senior Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our backend systems leverage the latest C# and .NET Core technologies, deployed in Kubernetes on AWS. We thrive on collaboration, innovation, and crafting scalable, reliable systems that power seamless communication worldwide.
   

  

 If you're a Senior Backend Engineer with a passion for problem-solving, clean code, and modern DevOps practices, we'd love to have you on our team.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Major professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Proficiency in additional programming languages such as C++, Python, or Kotlin
* Experience with Asterisk and VoIP protocols, preferably SIP.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Software Engineer
description:
The era of pervasive AI has arrived. In this era, organizations will use generative AI to unlock hidden value in their data, accelerate processes, reduce costs, drive efficiency and innovation to fundamentally transform their businesses and operations at scale.
   

  

 SambaNova Suite™ is the first full-stack, generative AI platform, from chip to model, optimized for enterprise and government organizations. Powered by the intelligent SN40L chip, the SambaNova Suite is a fully integrated platform, delivered on-premises or in the cloud, combined with state-of-the-art open-source models that can be easily and securely fine-tuned using customer data for greater accuracy. Once adapted with customer data, customers retain model ownership in perpetuity, so they can turn generative AI into one of their most valuable assets.
   

  

 If you recently graduated (within the past 2 years) or will graduate within the upcoming academic year and are interested in full-time software engineering opportunities with the leading AI startup, please apply below and tell us a little about yourself! If there's a match someone will be in contact.
   

  

 We are looking especially for engineers with
 **two or more** 
 of the following skill sets:
   

  

* Tooling and Infrastructure
* System Software
* Machine Learning & Applications
* Computer Architecture
* Hardware / Software Co-Design


**Benefits Summary For US-Based Full-Time Direct Employment Positions**
**(The Recruiter will provide benefit details for non-US-based roles)**
 SambaNova offers a competitive total rewards package, including the base salary, plus equity and benefits. We cover 95% premium coverage for employee medical insurance, and 77% premium coverage for dependents and offer a Health Savings Account (HSA) with employer contribution. We also offer Dental, Vision, Short/Long term Disability, Basic Life, Voluntary Life, and AD&D insurance plans in addition to Flexible Spending Account (FSA) options like Health Care, Limited Purpose, and Dependent Care. Our library of well-being benefits available to you and your dependents includes a full subscription to Headspace, Gympass+ membership with access to physical gyms, One Medical membership, counseling services with an Employee Assistance Program, and much more.
   

  

**Submission Guidelines**
 Please note that in order to be considered an applicant for any position at SambaNova Systems, you must submit an application form for each position for which you believe you are qualified.
   

  

*If you are a new, recent (within the last two years), or upcoming college graduate and are interested in opportunities with SambaNova Systems, please apply through our university job listings.*
**EEO Policy**
 SambaNova Systems is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard basis of age (40 and over), color, disability, gender identity, genetic information, marital status, military or veteran status, national origin/ancestry, race, religion, creed, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding), sexual orientation, and any other applicable status protected by federal, state, or local laws.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description:
**About LEIA** 

 At Leia Health, we are on a mission to transform parental leave and postpartum health. Our innovative Parental Leave solution integrates seamlessly with companies' existing HR systems, digitizing and streamlining the planning and communication process around parental leave. By supporting employees’ postpartum health, we enable a healthier, more sustainable return to work while fostering a family-friendly workplace culture. 
 



  




**About the Role: Sr. Full-Stack Software Engineer** 

 Join LEIA Health as a Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer and take a leading role in shaping the technology behind our B2C and B2B platforms. In addition to maintaining and enhancing our existing codebase, you'll spearhead the development of cutting-edge features, guide the integration of modern AI technologies, and help set the technical direction for our team. As a leader within the development team, you’ll mentor colleagues, foster collaboration, and ensure the delivery of high-quality, impactful solutions. This role spans the full development lifecycle, from infrastructure management to creating innovative, user-centric solutions that push the boundaries of digital health.
 



  




**How you make an impact** 
* Design and architecture LEIA’s tech solutions.
* Maintain and enhance LEIA’s app and B2B web platform, delivering a seamless experience to users.
* Build new features that align with our mission and user needs.
* Oversee and improve our tech infrastructure to ensure reliability and scalability.
* Leverage modern AI techniques to enhance LEIA’s product offerings.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, contribute to code reviews, and support agile workflows.



  




**What You Bring** 

 We’re seeking a strong, adaptable engineer with a "can-do-anything" attitude. You thrive on tackling complex problems across the full stack, taking ownership, and driving solutions in a fast-moving startup environment.
 



  




**Your Skills and Experience** 
* A proven track record of writing clean, reliable code and delivering high-quality, scalable solutions.
* Expertise in front-end engineering with 
 **TypeScript** 
  and 
 **React** 
 , building polished, user-friendly interfaces with attention to detail.
* Proficiency in back-end development with tools like 
 **Express** 
 , 
 **GraphQL** 
 , and 
 **Next.js** 
  to create robust, efficient services.
* Hands-on experience with automated testing frameworks and tools such as 
 **Jest** 
 , 
 **Testing Library** 
 , or 
 **Cypress** 
 .
* Hands-on experience deploying your code to production and a solid understanding of infrastructure concepts (e.g., cloud environments, 
 **Docker** 
 , 
 **Kubernetes** 
 , 
 **GCP** 
 , CI/CD pipelines).
* Experience designing and building 
 **SaaS products** 
 , with a background in agile team collaboration.
* Familiarity with modern AI technologies and APIs (e.g., 
 **OpenAI API** 
 ). Bonus if you’ve contributed to 
 **AI-driven features** 
 !
* Proficient in managing repositories, performing code reviews, and collaborating effectively via 
 **Git** 
 .
* Strong 
 **English** 
  communication skills, both written and verbal.


- 

**It Would Be Nice If You Have** 
* Experience maintaining and optimizing 
 **Kotlin** 
 -based
 
 services.
* Familiarity with 
 **cloud-first infrastructure management** 
  and related best practices.
* Knowledge of 
 **Google Cloud Platform (GCP)** 
  and its ecosystem of products.
* Experience with 
 **marketing automation tools** 
  like 
 **Customer.io** 
  or 
 **Braze** 
  (a big plus!).


- 

**What we offer** 
* Opportunity to engage, strengthen and support extraordinary parents across the world.
* A key role in growing an early stage team where you’ll build both the product and the business.
* Experience building a global tech startup from an early stage.
* Be a part of a global expansion, where moving into new markets will present new exciting possibilities to connect with local communities and grow both personally and professionally.
* We are an organization committed to creating and maintaining an inspiring workplace where everyone loves to go to work.
* 30 days vacation per year.
* Wellness benefit of 3000 SEK per year.
* Parental Leave Benefits.



  





**Employment:** 
 Full-time.
 



**Fixed monthly salary:** 
  Competitive, based on experience.
 



**Stock Options:** 
  Yes
 



**Effective Start date:** 
 As soon as possible.
 



**Where will you work?** 
 Hybrid, split your time between remote work and our office in Vasastan, Stockholm.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Exciting Front-End Developer Opportunity in Stockholm – 6-Month Contract**
 We are currently looking for a skilled and motivated Front-End Developer to join a dynamic team in Stockholm for an exciting 6-month contract. This is a great opportunity for developers with a passion for building seamless and engaging user interfaces.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain responsive, high-quality web applications.
* Work closely with the design and back-end teams to ensure a smooth integration of front-end solutions.
* Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code, while adhering to best practices.
* Collaborate on various stages of the development lifecycle, from ideation to deployment.


**Skills And Experience Required**
* Strong expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* Solid experience in creating responsive web designs.
* Knowledge of version control tools like Git.
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs and integration.
* Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken. Knowledge of Swedish is a plus.


**Why Apply?**
* Work in the heart of Stockholm in a collaborative, innovative team.
* Engage with challenging, impactful projects in a fast-growing environment.
* Enjoy flexibility and a chance to enhance your professional growth with a 6-month contract.


 If you are an innovative front-end developer looking for an exciting challenge in one of Europe’s most vibrant tech hubs, we want to hear from you!

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches, Swedish style snus online as well as disposable vapes. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 200 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 We are looking for a Frontend Developer with 3+ years of experience to join our in-house technology team. As part of our journey toward innovation and scaling, you’ll play an important role in building and optimizing the technical platform that drives our business.
   

  

 This is an exciting opportunity for a driven and collaborative developer who thrives in a fast-paced environment. You will contribute to developing and maintaining features for our e-commerce platform while growing your technical skills alongside experienced colleagues.
   

  

 Our frontend architecture is built on a custom TypeScript framework, seamlessly integrated with a .NET Core backend. We use Webpack, TypeScript, and Less to deliver cutting-edge solutions for our e-commerce platform.
   

  

 As a part of the Haypp Group Tech team, you’ll be joining a collaborative group of 11 tech enthusiasts who value innovation, knowledge sharing, and an open culture where every idea counts.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop, implement, and maintain features for our e-commerce platform.
* Collaborate with the team and stakeholders to deliver quality solutions aligned with business needs.
* Contribute to platform optimization and performance improvements.
* Participate in team discussions and contribute innovative ideas for technical solutions.
* Embrace challenges, engage in continuous learning, and grow as a developer.


**What We Want From You**
 We want you to succeed and thrive within this role and our team. Here’s what we’re looking for:
   

  

 3+ years of professional experience in frontend development.
   

  

 Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern frontend, and experience building modern frontend web solutions.
   

  

 Hands-on experience with SASS or LESS, and tools like Webpack.
   

  

 Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
   

  

 Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work effectively with technical and non-technical team members.
   

  

 Fluency in English, which is the working language at Haypp Group.
   

  

**Bonus Skills That Make You Stand Out:**
* Familiarity with backend technologies, particularly .NET Core.
* Experience working with B2C e-commerce platforms or other consumer-facing applications.
* Knowledge of cloud services or DevOps practices.
* A willingness to take on new challenges and grow your technical expertise.


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *No Douchebags* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Viktoria Sobolewski at viktoria.sobolewski@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With ten e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 950 000 consumers.

title: Game developer
description:
We are now looking for the best game developer to join us! You have the chance to be a part of creating the best casino games in the online slot industry!
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and maintain Casino Games for both desktop and mobile browsers
* The technologies you primarily will work with are HTML5, WebGL, Typescript, Pixi, GSAP and Javascript.
* In a team environment that consists of product management, graphic artistry, sound creation, server development and game mechanics, you will contribute to deliver the best casino games in the market today.
* Your main responsibilities are to make the game graphics come alive with spectacular animations, game flow, game mechanics and sounds according to a result delivered by our game servers.


 Who you are
   

  

* You are a Master Google Searcher that have Stackoverflow as your absolute favourite web site.
* You have practical experience of working with OOP in some language and you have a pragmatic approach to software development.
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in.
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you.
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and take ownership of changes from editor to production system.


 Beneficial skills
   

  

* Working experience of mobile browsers and knowledge about their limitations and how they work in different ways is a big plus.


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Backend Software Engineer
description:
**About Us** 




 Alrik is revolutionizing construction logistics through smart, user-centric software that connects building material suppliers, carriers, truck drivers, and construction companies. We’ve raised €4,5m to date and expand across Europe. We build to become the Global OS for Construction Logistics.
 



  





**The Role** 




 As a Backend Engineer at Alrik, you'll join our core engineering team in building scalable systems that power the future of construction logistics. You'll work directly on features that impact thousands of users daily.
 



 We rarely expand our team, so this is a unique opportunity to join a high-performing group where you can truly make your mark.
 



  





**What you’ll do** 



* Design, develop, and maintain backend systems and APIs using modern technologies
* Create and maintain CI/CD pipelines within GCP
* Work in a fast-paced environment, delivering high-quality code through short iterations
* Engage in cross-functional collaboration
* Help shape the engineering culture by sharing knowledge and advocating for best practices



  





 A taste of our tech stack: Python, FastAPI, Pydantic, MySQL, Pub/Sub, TypeScript and GCP. 
 



  





 No problem if you are not fluent in Python, yet, any other modern backend language combined with a great mindset will be a perfect start.
 



  





 Good engineering culture and having fun at work are important for us.
 



  





**What we're are looking for** 



* Working a few years as a Backend Engineer
* Hands-on experience with GCP and CI/CD
* Customer-centric mindset with a passion for solving real-world problems
* Experience in a fast-paced setting, comfortable with quick iterations
* Excellent team player
* Fluent in English, Swedish not a requirement
* Able to work in Sweden



  





**What we offer** 



* Work with the latest technologies and build innovative products alongside skilled and energized colleagues
* Direct influence on product decisions and architecture
* Benefit:
* Competitive salary
* Equity participation
* 30 days vacation
* Healthcare and wellness allowance
* Hybrid work setup from our Stockholm office



 This is your chance to be part of something truly impactful. Join Alrik and help us reshape the construction industry with state-of-the-art technology!

title: Full-Stack & AI Devs Internship at GADDR
description:
**About Gaddr** 




 Gaddr is a Stockholm-based IT company providing
 **Universal Platforms** 
 and
 **AI solutions** 
 for businesses. Founded in 2016, we are building an international, like-minded team committed to pushing the boundaries of technology.
 


* **GaddrMe** 
 : Our flagship app unites all social media identities in one place, soon to be re-released with privacy as its core focus.
* **Personas** 
 : AI-driven product suite offering personality and trend analyses to understand human behavior in various fields such as Marketing, Recruitment, Sales, and Customer Support.
* **Intelligence** 
 : Over 50 powerful AI cores and custom projects—choose from our ready-made modules or let us bring your unique vision to life.
* **Cowork** 
 : Located at Alviks Strand in Stockholm with 838m² of dedicated space, we offer private rooms, open co-working, events, and meeting areas with a sea view.



 With our expertise in
 **artificial intelligence** 
 ,
 **technology** 
 , and
 **machine learning** 
 , we’re shaping the future of digital platforms and business solutions.
 


 Role Overview
 
 As a
 **Full-Stack & AI Developer** 
 at Gaddr, you will help design and develop scalable applications that leverage AI to deliver seamless, efficient, and secure experiences. This is a unique opportunity to be part of a fast-paced, collaborative environment and work on products that have real-world impact.
 


 Key Responsibilities
 * **Full-Stack Development**
* Build responsive, high-performing web applications using frameworks like React, Node.js, or Django.
* **AI & Machine Learning**
* Develop, train, and deploy machine learning models for applications like personality analysis, trend forecasting, and more.
* **API Design & Integration**
* Create and maintain APIs to ensure reliable data exchange between various platforms and services.
* **Collaboration**
* Partner closely with UI/UX designers, product owners, and other developers to deliver user-centric solutions.
* **Optimization**
* Identify performance bottlenecks and implement solutions for improved efficiency.
* **Data Management**
* Handle large datasets for analysis, model training, and deployment.


 Qualifications
 * **Education**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* **Experience**
* Proficiency in full-stack development (JavaScript, Python, or Ruby).
* Hands-on experience with AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn).
* Knowledge of front-end frameworks (React, Angular, or Vue) and back-end systems (Node.js, Django, or Flask).
* Familiarity with databases (SQL, MongoDB).
* **Soft Skills**
* Strong problem-solving abilities, excellent communication, and a team-oriented mindset.
* **Bonus Points**
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
* Knowledge of DevOps and CI/CD pipelines.
* Familiarity with blockchain technologies.


 What We Offer
 * **Innovative Environment**
* Work on cutting-edge projects that fuse AI with modern web and mobile technologies.
* **Skill Growth**
* Access to a wide range of projects and mentorship opportunities to refine your technical skills.
* **Flexibility**
* Remote-friendly options with adaptable hours.
* **Impact**
* Play a key role in shaping the future of social media, AI-driven analysis, and co-working solutions.


 How to Apply
 
 If you’re excited about creating intelligent solutions and working with state-of-the-art technologies, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit:
 


1. **Your resume**
2. **A brief cover letter** 
 explaining your interest in the role
3. **Links to your portfolio** 
 or relevant projects



 Let’s build the future together!
 **🚀**

title: Senior Backend developer
description:
**Senior Backend Developer – Help Fix One of the Biggest Problems in Construction** 




***(No consultants/recruiters please)***




 Before reading this ad, you probably hadn’t heard of AI-BOB. That’s okay. What matters is that we’re fixing a €10 billion problem that no one else is solving properly. And we need you to help us do it.
 



  





**So, what’s the problem?** 
 In Sweden alone, one in four euros spent in construction is wasted - because of design errors, compliance failures, and poor planning. That’s enough money to build 50,000 apartments every year or three Öresund Bridges. It’s 3,500 SEK wasted every second, 24/7 and that’s just one country. Now, imagine the scale of this problem worldwide.
 



  





**We’re here to change that.** 
 AI-BOB is an AI-powered platform that catches construction mistakes before they happen, making sure buildings are designed right from the beginning. No costly fixes. No wasted materials. No unnecessary delays.
 



  





 If you had joined us earlier, we’d likely have already saved tons of construction waste and cut millions in unnecessary costs.
 **So yes - you’re needed.** 




  





  





**What You’ll Be Doing** 



* Develop scalable and efficient backend systems that power AI-BOB’s compliance platform.
* Solve complex problems in areas like 3D algorithms, machine learning, image recognition, and generative AI.
* Build rock-solid APIs that keep data flowing seamlessly between frontend and external systems.
* Optimize our platform for performance, security, and scalability.
* Collaborate with AI researchers, architects, and engineers to build innovative solutions.
* Experiment, iterate, and push boundaries - because we’re building something that hasn’t been done before.



  





**Who We’re Looking For** 




 We’re looking for someone who likes hard problems and is driven by real impact.
 



 ✔ Expertise in TypeScript and a track record of building scalable backend systems.
 



 ✔ A problem-solver at heart, with experience tackling challenges like 3D algorithms, AI/ML, image recognition, or generative AI.
 



 ✔ Someone who cares about sustainability and wants to cut waste from construction.
 



 ✔ A curious, creative thinker who’s fascinated by the intersection of construction and tech.
 



 ✔ A self-starter who thrives in a fast-moving, product-focused environment.
 



  





**Why AI-BOB?** 




 🚀 Be Part of Something Big – We’re fixing one of the biggest inefficiencies in construction.
 



 🌍 Real-World Impact – Your work will help reduce waste, cut costs, and make buildings more sustainable.
 



 💡 Work with Cutting-Edge Tech – AI, 3D algorithms, machine learning, automation—you name it.
 



 🤝 A Team That Has Your Back – We trust each other, we support each other, and we have fun doing it.
 



 💰 Competitive Salary & Equity – We’re still small, but we plan to grow fast—and you’ll grow with us.
 



  





**How to Apply** 




 We don’t expect you to meet 100% of the criteria. If this sounds exciting, we want to hear from you.
 



 📩 Send us your CV and a few words about yourself to jobs@aibob.io.
 



  





 We promise to get back to you as soon as we can. Let’s build something amazing together. 🚀
 



  





**More about us** 




*Part of Norrsken Foundations Impact Accelerator. Watch our pitch below:* 




 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UN1MghXngus
 



  





**Investment news** 




 https://www.di.se/digital/rusning-till-bygg-ai-ska-bli-globalt-arbetssatt/
 



 https://www.breakit.se/artikel/42513/proptech-startupen-ai-bob-vill-losa-problem-i-byggbranschen-tar-in-23-miljoner
 



 https://www.byggindustrin.se/utveckling/teknik-och-innovation/ai-bob-sakrar-kapital-for-internationell-expansion/
 



 https://techfundingnews.com/ai-bob-scoops-e2m-funding-how-this-female-led-startup-is-transforming-construction-industry/
 



  





**Other** 




 https://www.di.se/digital/sa-ska-hennes-ai-minska-byggfel-och-spara-miljoner/
 



 https://www.breakit.se/artikel/41643/elin-martensson-drar-hem-storaffar-till-ai-bob-bara-10-manader-efter-starten-visar-att-vi-ar-pa-ratt-vag
 



 https://www.impactloop.se/artikel/ska-gora-byggen-mer-hallbara-ai-bob-varvar-teknisk-chef-fran-fishbrain/

title: Frontend Developer
description:
*Natural Cycles° is a leading women’s health company that developed the world’s first birth control app, used by millions globally. We are a fast growing startup, and we promote an international working environment filled with smart and ambitious colleagues based in Stockholm, Geneva, New York, and remotely. Our mission is to pioneer women’s health through research and passion, empowering every woman with the knowledge she needs to take charge of her health.* 




  





 You’re a Frontend Developer who thrives in a fast-paced, data-driven, analytical and agile environment. Your soft skills shine and you can communicate with ease in English. You are passionate about technology, team work, but also have a responsibility and autonomy in your work. You are able to work efficiently in a remote work environment, in a setting where online and asynchronous communication is the foundation. You will be joining the Product team and working on the integration of the app with external temperature measuring devices.
 



  





**What you will be doing** 



* Ship top-quality, performant, accessible, inclusive user interfaces, features and products
* Work on the device integrations with the Natural Cycles core App (built as a Hybrid Web application, packaged for iOS and Android)
* Work in an agile team together with other software engineers, product manager, designers & testers
* Work in close collaboration with stakeholders across the organization to deliver top-quality user interfaces and features
* Work hands-on with data insights and analytics and if possible, always take the data driven approach
* Ensure continuous delivery of new releases while working in an agile way
* Maintain a healthy codebase



  





**What skills and experience we think you have** 



* Experience in frontend development: building websites, web applications, responsive layout
* Good understanding of modern CSS (e.g Flexbox, Grid), experience with modern pre/post-processors, such as SASS, PostCSS
* Experience with TypeScript and Angular framework (or ability to quickly learn)
* Experience working with git, github, pull requests, code review etc.



  





**Not required but it would be a bonus if you also have:** 



* Experience with native iOS (Swift) and/or Android (Kotlin) development, or app development in general
* Experience with building software that integrates with connected devices (via Bluetooth, API etc)
* Experience with Node.js backend development
* A passion for women’s health



  





**Our technology stack includes:** 



* TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js running on GCP AppEngine
* Ionic, Angular, Capacitor, React
* Firebase Hosting
* Highly automated CI pipelines (Github Actions)
* AppStore/GooglePlay releases on a biweekly basis
* We <3 Open Source, encourage Open Source contributions and often open our general-purpose repositories



  





**What we offer** 



* Flexible work arrangement - you will be part of a team based in and around Stockholm that values effective collaboration and transparent communication, irrespective of work location
* Professional development - you will collaborate with industry leading developers, promoting continuous growth and skill enhancement
* Modern technology - you will leverage innovative technologies and tools, within an environment that empowers you to contribute ideas and take ownership of your work
* Impactful projects - you will contribute to groundbreaking projects that redefine industry standards and create tangible value
* Commitment to quality - you will join a dynamic and progressive organization that prioritizes profitable, long-term product development



  





**Location** 




 We are remote-friendly, but we find great value in being able to connect with our teams in person. Most of the product team you will work with is located in Stockholm.
 



 Not living in Sweden? No problem! We offer relocation support to help you move.
 



  





**Sounds interesting?** 




 If you want to be part of a successful team, we encourage you to apply for this position as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to hearing from you!
 



  





**How to apply** 




 To apply, just upload your CV and answer the questions on the application form. Keep in mind that we can't accept applications through email because of GDPR, and only applications submitted via the career site (and in English) will be considered.
 



  





 At Natural Cycles we value diversity and inclusion because we know that teams with people from different backgrounds and experiences are stronger. We welcome candidates from all walks of life and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.
 



  





**Note: We are not looking for consultants or help from recruitment agencies**

title: Frontend Developer - Consumer Experience team
description:
**About Us**
 In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the consumer at heart.
   

  

 We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for you to help us on the journey ahead.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re now looking for an experienced Frontend Developer who wants to work with some of Sweden's most used delivery tracking services. You will create impact by contributing to the development and maintenance of our consumer facing applications and services using modern tooling, creating a great user experience. With us you’ll be able to shape the future of our products that directly affect millions of users all over Europe.
   

  

**Your future team**
 The Consumer Experience team is responsible for creating a seamless delivery experience for our consumers across all consumer facing products. We want to do everything we can to understand our consumers and adapt to new market trends. By increasing transparency and improving flexibility during the delivery journey - we aim to create the world’s best delivery tracking platforms.
   

  

**What We're Looking For**
 We are looking for a engineer with at least 5 years of work experience - If you are a skilled problem solver who loves coding and making complex things work, then this is the place for you! We value individuals who are keen to learn, and your eagerness to develop your skill set will probably be your strongest asset when joining us. Beyond that we imagine that you have the following:
   

  

* At least 5 years of work experience as a Frontend Engineer in a modern tech environment
* Experience with TypeScript/React/Next.js and other modern web technologies
* Worked on building and maintaining large-scale web applications
* Great problem-solving skills and ability to think about sustainable and long-term solutions
* Experience in working with an agile development methodology
* Comfortable making both technical and business decisions
* Proficient in English
* Based in Sweden (Stockholm)


**What You’ll Get**
 We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like changes and want to set new processes and ways of working - this is the place for you!
   

  

**Benefits**
 Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:
   

  

 🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.
   

  

 🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!
   

  

 🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town
   

  

 🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.
   

  

 👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.
   

  

 💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.
   

  

 🏓 Fun & Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.
   

  

 ⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.
   

  

 🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!
   

  

 👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care and love to your little one.
   

  

 Diversity and inclusion are very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.
   

  

*This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.*
 Instabee was founded in 2022 after combining Budbee and Instabox — two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox and Porterbuddy. Instabee is present in six countries, serving thousands of online merchants, including ASOS, Zalando, Inditex and H&M and is on track to become the most admired European e-commerce enabler.
   

  

 Since the start, Instabee has focused on consumer-centric and sustainable solutions, offering deliveries to boxes and homes using muscle power, electricity, renewable diesel and biofuels. Through bespoke technical solutions, Instabee can guarantee optimal fill rates and routing, minimising any unnecessary transports. Instabee is backed by Kinnevik, Creades and EQT, among others.

title: AI Developer Intern
description:
Realdini Studios is an early-stage and innovative game development company pushing the boundaries of AI integration in gaming. Our mission is to create immersive, intelligent, and dynamic gaming experiences that redefine interactive entertainment. We are seeking a passionate AI Developer to join our creative team and help shape the future of AI-driven gaming.
 



  





 Role Description:
 



 As an AI Developer Intern for our early-stage company, you’ll focus on creating visually stunning environments, characters, and assets. This role is ideal for candidates with a creative eye, attention to detail, and a passion for crafting immersive visual experiences that bring gameplay mechanics to life.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 


* Contribute to the visual and design elements of our games, including animation.
* Collaborate with the team to enhance the aesthetics and overall artistic quality.
* Bring creativity, attention to detail, and fresh ideas to the table.



  





 What We’re Looking For
 



 While technical skills are important, we value:
 


* Reliability: Dependable individuals who deliver on commitments.
* Personal Fit: Team players with a collaborative spirit and enthusiasm for gaming.
* Growth Potential: Candidates with a genuine passion for learning and contributing to innovative projects.



  





 Required Skills:
 


* AI Frameworks and Libraries: Familiarity with TensorFlow, PyTorch, or OpenAI APIs.
* Generative Models: Experience working with LLMs (like LLAMA, GPT) and generative tools for images, videos, and 3D assets.
* Text-to-Speech Systems: Knowledge of TTS frameworks such as Google Text-to-Speech or Tacotron.
* AI-Assisted Tools: Tools like Runway ML, NVIDIA Omniverse, or Adobe Firefly for asset generation.
* Unreal Engine AI Systems: Understanding of Behavior Trees, Blackboard systems, and integration of AI-driven characters.
* Optimization Techniques: Proficiency in balancing AI complexity with game performance requirements.
* Experimentation Skills: Ability to research and test the latest AI models, such as MidJourney or Stable Diffusion for generated visuals.



  





 What You’ll Gain
 



 This is more than just an internship; it’s a stepping stone into the gaming industry:
 


* The opportunity to directly contribute to the creation of immersive games.
* A chance to build your portfolio and enhance your resume with real-world projects.
* Insight into the creative processes at Realdini Studios, a leader in AI-driven game storytelling.



  





 Important Details
 


* This is an unpaid internship focused on skill enhancement and career development.
* Screening Question:
 *“Are you aware this is an unpaid internship focused on enhancing your skillset and resume?”*



  





 Join Us in Shaping the Future of Gaming
 


* We would love to hear from you if you’re ready to unleash your creativity and take your skills to the next level!

title: Java developer
description:
The Development Sales team is part of the Technology organization at Tre. Our main task is to develop the systems used in sales to end customers—everything from store solutions to the sales engine for our online shops.

 As a Java developer, you are responsible for developing existing applications and support systems. We code in the latest Java version and use REST for APIs. **About You**
 To thrive in the role, we are looking for you who are committed and take the initiative to find your ways and processes to work more efficiently. You solve problems by rethinking and taking input from others.

 ,

 We are accepting applications via this job ad, and interviews are ongoing. A personal letter is not required, but we would like you to answer the questions we ask in connection with your application. We use tests to ensure objective assessments in the selection of candidates. The position may be filled before the application deadline. Background checks are carried out on the final candidate.

title: Senior FrontEnd Engineer, Web
description:
**Job Description**
 Are you an experienced software engineer ready to jump into an exciting role building something new on Wolt’s consumer and payment domains? Do you strive for releasing high-quality code to production? If yes, we might just have the spot for you as we are looking for a Frontend Software Developer to join our Payments Platform team in building world-class payment infrastructure on our web app.
   

  

 The Payments Platform team owns the end-to-end payment UX, from users choosing a payment on checkout to users switching to external apps for authentications. It’s a cross-functional team of frontend, backend and mobile engineers building product features end-to-end both within the team and in collaboration with other product and engineering teams (e.g. Consumer Web team).
   

  

 You would be joining a new team with a real opportunity to contribute to the team's roadmap, tech choices, ways of working, and, naturally, be able to build all kinds of cool payments-related, user-facing features that will directly impact Wolt users’ customer experience. Since the team is in its early stages, you would have a real impact developing the Web App’s future, which is quite exciting really! Technical work you’ll drill down into can relate to anything from implementing purchase order designs for checkout to integrating SDKs of new payment methods across our 30 countries.
   

  

 The Payment Platform Teams implement payment and fraud solutions on Wolt’s checkout, as well as ensure that other quickly growing teams at Wolt can readily use payments based on their needs (i.e. multi-payment, bill-splitting, tipping, top ups, recurring payments, two-factor authentication on demand, etc). As Wolt operates internationally in 30 countries and over 200 cities these teams are in a vital spot for enabling a smooth checkout experience for our 15 million registered customers and ensuring stable, safe and error-proof money flows!
   

  

 You can be based in our tech hubs located in Stockholm, Helsinki or Tallinn, alternatively we offer fully remote role within Sweden, Finland, Estonia or Germany.
   

  

 What we value
   

  

 As the business is 24/7 so must our services be. We have lots of exciting and challenging engineering topics for seasoned engineers: state management, component architecture, code reusability, api designs and last but not least, test automation.
   

  

**Ownership:** 
 We handle the whole development process (business logic, testing, database & data streaming, CI/CD, analytics, cloud) ourselves in an autonomous manner. Don’t worry, we’re not alone: We have support from central teams when we need help.
   

  

**Technology:** 
 We use modern tools and technologies. Current stack in use is React + Typescript, React Testing Library, GitHub Actions, Playwright, Storybook and TanStack React Query.
   

  

**Autonomy:** 
 We make the decisions as a team and group of teams! We are free to choose the technology stack and tools and make architectural decisions together. No top-down decisions!
   

  

**Creativity:** 
 We’re building lots of new stuff with minimal technical debt so you can focus on developing new features.
   

  

**Diversity:** 
 We have different people with different backgrounds. Cultivating diversity and maintaining different opinions is the key to our success.
   

  

 Our humble expectations
   

  

 You might be the one we are looking for if you have several years of experience building apps using React & Typescript and delivering modern, testable and maintainable code. Experience in payments or payment integrations would be highly valued but not mandatory. We commit to a user-centric approach and expect to find someone like-minded.
   

  

 On top of that, we value an attitude of constant improvements and also the ability to create things from scratch. An entrepreneurial mindset of taking ownership of what you've built is a must!
   

  

**Next Steps**
 The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!
   

  

 The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.
   

  

**About Wolt**
 Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants) and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 29 countries today, 25 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.
   

  

**Working in Product Development at Wolt**
 At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.
   

  

 The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 700+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 60 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.
   

  

 Join us today to build Wolt together.

title: Senior .NET Developer

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**⚡️ What We Do**
 Swiftly gaining ground as Sweden’s industry leader in battery storage and expanding rapidly in selected European markets, Flower is on a mission to enable the energy system of tomorrow.
   

  

 With an industry-leading AI-powered platform at its core, our service includes stabilizing the energy system by enhancing predictability and flexibility for both energy producers and consumers. By combining pioneering technology with a portfolio of flexible energy assets, we break new ground towards a fossil-free energy system, allowing clean energy to power society.
   

  

**🌟Who We Are**
 Tech company at heart – purpose in our DNA. Flower consists of a diverse group of innovative individuals with a strong desire to improve the state of the world.
   

  

 At Flower, we believe trust, collaboration and diversity are essential to not only create an inclusive work environment, but also drive career growth. By embracing varying perspectives, we allow creativity and progress to flourish.
   

  

 To accelerate towards our goal of becoming the pioneering force powering the energy system of tomorrow, we are now looking for a passionate Senior Software Engineer.
   

  

**👩‍💻 About The Role**
 The Flower Portal is the cornerstone product of how our Partners track their investments in flexible energy assets and understand their impact on the energy system. As an early member of the team, your contributions will directly shape the product’s success and influence how Flower is perceived. Together, we’ll build a strong and collaborative team culture as we drive the green energy transition forward.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Dive into the world of green energy transition and gain a deep understanding of Flower’s offerings
* Collaborate closely with our Product Owner, and fellow Software Engineers in a small team to build great solutions
* Develop our product in typescript using tools like React and NestJS
* Build stable, scalable solutions and ensure quality by working with test frameworks
* Play a key role in shaping architecture, design decisions, and aligning development with user needs and business goals
* Bring clarity to complex data, helping Partners understand and engage with Flower’s vision and value proposition
* Drive new features connected to internationalization, diversification of our portfolio of assets and new realtime data streams
* Drive the development of new features, including internationalization, portfolio diversification, and integration of new data streams


**Who You Are**
 You are a humble and dedicated professional, ready to roll up your sleeves and dive into the work required to achieve our ambitious goals. Therefore, we believe that you possess the following traits:
   

  

* You’re a natural problem solver who loves tackling new challenges and apply 80/20 thinking to focus on the most impactful solutions
* Communication and teamwork are your strengths — you enjoy collaborating and bringing ideas to life
* You thrive in fast-paced environments, enjoy exploring unbeaten paths and embrace the ‘fail fast, learn fast’ approach
* You have 6+ years of experience in software engineering with a strong track record in a similar role
* You have a knack for building applications from scratch or scaling them up early on
* Backend development is your sweet spot, and you’re comfortable with one or more frameworks
* You you’re happy to see features through to the client and thrive working as a full-stack
* You have got deep experience working with cloud platforms and know how to leverage them effectively


**📍 Location**
 Our beautiful office is located in the heart of Södermalm just a short walk from Slussen subway station. We encourage in-office collaboration but support a hybrid work model.
   

  

**✉️ Apply**
 Our corporate language is English, as we have over 20 nationalities in the office. We therefore appreciate it if you could submit your CV in English.
   

  

 Throughout the recruitment process you will meet with the People & Talent Partner, Head of Flower Portal, Engineers, VP of Asset Management, and our CEO.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

*We kindly but firmly decline any engagement in recruitment assistance for our hiring processes. This includes partnership offers or the sale of recruitment tools.*

title: Account Executive/Business Developer
description:
**Om oss** 




*Pinpoint Estimates är ett dynamiskt fintech-bolag baserat i Stockholm. Vi är en öppen plattform som crowdsourcar finansiella estimat från oberoende analytiker och privata investerare för börsnoterade bolag, vilket bidrar till en mer transparent aktiemarknad. Vi har nyligen säkrat kapital för att driva vår vision framåt. Med resurser på plats satsar vi fullt på innovation, tillväxt och att bygga ett starkt team.* 




  





 Vi söker en driven och resultatinriktad Account Executive för att vidareutveckla vår verksamhet. Idag erbjuder vi en IR-produkt för nordiska noterade bolag samt data för finansiella institutioner och investeringsplattformar.
 



  





 I denna roll ansvarar du för att identifiera och skapa nya affärsmöjligheter, bygga starka kundrelationer och driva intäktsökning. Vi letar efter en självgående person med utmärkt kommunikationsförmåga och ett starkt driv för försäljning.
 



  





**Dina ansvarsområden** 



* Identifiera och prospektera potentiella kunder genom research, nätverkande och outreach.
* Ta fram och genomföra engagerande och kundanpassade säljpresentationer och produktdemonstrationer.
* Bygga och underhålla starka relationer med beslutsfattare.
* Förhandla avtal, prissättning och villkor för att framgångsrikt stänga affärer.
* Samarbeta med interna team för att säkerställa en smidig kundupplevelse.
* Följa upp och hantera försäljningsaktiviteter via CRM-system, vi använder Hubspot.



  





**Vi söker dig som har** 



* Exceptionell kommunikationsförmåga – du är en skicklig presentatör och relationsbyggare.
* Bevisad säljerfarenhet – du har framgångsrikt sålt produkter inom finans, fintech, kapitalmarknader, IR eller relaterade områden.
* Erfarenhet av C-level-dialoger – du kan tryggt och effektivt interagera med personer på högsta ledningsnivå.
* Kundfokus – du förstår kunders affärsbehov och kan positionera lösningar på ett effektivt sätt.
* Starka förhandlingsegenskaper – du är van vid komplexa affärer och känner dig trygg i förhandlingar.



  





**Vad vi erbjuder dig** 



* En flexibel arbetsmiljö där du kan påverka och växa tillsammans med bolaget.
* Möjlighet att vara en del av en spännande tillväxtresa och utveckla en innovativ produkt.
* Konkurrenskraftig lön, som består av fast och varierande del samt tjänstepension.
* Möjlighet till personaloptioner.
* En inkluderande och dynamisk företagskultur som värdesätter varje individ.



  





  





**Ansökan** 




 Ansök genom Linkedin eller skicka ditt CV och personliga brev som beskriver din relevanta erfarenhet till natasha@pinpointestimates.com.

title: Mobile SDK Developer
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our mobile client SDKs are key to how our customers integrate their products with our platform. We have clients ranging from small businesses to large enterprises, and their mobile apps are used by millions of people worldwide. By developing our voice and video SDKs together with the team, you will play a pivotal role in powering all those real-time conversations.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Mobile SDK Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing mobile SDKs while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop SDKs using WebRTC technology to optimize real-time communication features.
* Work with the team to align SDK APIs and features across multiple platforms, including iOS, Android, and Web/JavaScript.
* Develop cross-platform solutions using a C++ codebase shared between iOS and Android.
* Design APIs with simplicity in mind while maintaining modularity, extensibility, and API stability over time.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Professional expertise in modern C++, especially in mobile applications development.
* Professional experience developing for the iOS and/or Android platform.
* Experience with at least one of Kotlin or Objective-C/Swift.
* Experience working in Linux/macOS development environments and CI pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Experience with WebRTC protocols and NAT traversal, including ICE, STUN, and TURN, is a significant advantage.
* Experience developing software libraries and/or SDKs consumed by other developers.
* In-depth knowledge of network protocols such as IP, TCP, UDP, and DNS.
* Great debugging and troubleshooting skills.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
