- "My Competence Day" - dedikerade dagar för din personliga och professionella utveckling.

* När vi frågar våra medarbetare varför de trivs hos oss brukar de flesta svara företagskulturen, engagemanget bland kollegorna i kombination med möjligheterna att utvecklas. Hos oss får du arbeta med omkring 500 kollegor på en arbetsplats med massvis av möjligheter!

### **Skicka in din ansökan idag!**


Vi gör löpande urval och kallar till intervjuer, så vänta inte – ansök nu! Senast den 9/3 2025 vill vi ha din ansökan. Om du har frågor, tveka inte att höra av dig till Gustav Bergqvist. Team manager på Visma Spcs utvecklingsavdelning: gustav.bergqvist@visma.com .
  

Tester och bakgrundskontroller förekommer som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.

title: Product & Brand Designer
description:
**Shape the future of the Next Generation Crypto Bank**

  

Safello is growing fast. We’re evolving our **product, brand, and offering**, and we’re looking for a **Product & Brand Designer** to play a central role in that transformation.


At Safello, **our brand is our product**. Every screen, interaction, and visual detail creates the sense of clarity and trust that we build. We need a designer who is **visionary but also hands-on**—someone who sees what’s possible and can take an idea all the way from concept to a polished, seamless experience.

**What You’ll Do**

* **Shape the visual identity of our product**, creating a modern, cohesive, and engaging experience.
* **Refine and evolve the UI**, making sure Safello’s design feels effortless, intuitive, and distinctly our own.
* **Bridge brand and product**, ensuring that every design choice reinforces clarity, trust, and ease of use.
* **Work closely with UX, development, and marketing** to bring Safello’s design vision to life across every touchpoint.
* **Take ownership of our design system**, ensuring a scalable and consistent product experience.
* **Explore and push boundaries**, finding new ways to make Safello feel unique, innovative, and future-forward.
* 

**Who You Are**

* A **product designer** with a strong **UI and interaction design focus**.
* A **visionary designer**—you see the bigger picture but love to get hands-on with the details.
* Experience with **fintech, crypto, or other trust-based products** is a plus, but not a requirement.
* Have designed for **products that people love using**, preferably in tech, e-commerce, or digital services.
* Detail-oriented—**typography, spacing, micro-interactions, and motion matter to you**.
* Fluent in **modern design tools** like Figma, Adobe Suite, and motion/interaction tools.

**Why Join Safello?**

**Your design will shape Safello.** We’re building **The Next Generation Crypto Bank**, and you’ll have a key role in defining how it looks and feels.

* **A product-first company.** Here, design isn’t just a function—it’s a **competitive advantage**.
* **A culture that values craft.** We care about **every pixel, every animation, and every interaction**.
* **A chance to challenge and build the future.** We’re not thinking like a traditional bank—we’re building something completely new.


Sounds like you? Let’s talk. Or if you know someone who’d be a perfect fit, send them our way.

title: Product Owner @Minutizer
description:
We are Minutizer and we are looking for a **Product Owner** who is driven to grow into a Product Manager. If you’re a professional who has hands-on experience with making decisions for and about the product in companies that have their product and you’re up for a new challenge, we’d love to hear from you! Bonus if the experience is in marketplace products and if previously worked with the JTBD framework.  

  

**About the Role:** As a Product Owner in the Commercial team, you will lead the product department, driving the business and product roadmap. You'll ensure seamless collaboration between product, marketing, and customer experience teams while managing PRDs, user stories, and the product backlog. In your managerial role, you'll oversee a cross-functional team (UX, Data, CRO, Project Management) and coordinate with engineering to bring our vision to life.  

  

**What you’ll do?**  

**(1)** Develop, maintain, and execute a clear product roadmap that supports business objectives, and market demands.  

**(2)** Define, prioritize, and manage the backlog to ensure teams focus on high-impact features that deliver value.  

**(3)** Create detailed PRDs and user stories with clear acceptance criteria.
  

**(4)** Work closely with UX, Data, CRO, Engineering, and Project Management to coordinate efforts and deliver seamless product experiences.  

**(5)** Act as the primary link between product, marketing, and customer experience teams, ensuring clear communication and shared goals.
  

**(6)** Lead execution & delivery by overseeing product development, guiding teams, and ensuring timely, high-quality releases.
  

**(7)** Use insights from analytics, competitor research, and customer feedback to inform product decisions and continuously improve the user experience.  

  

**Must-Haves:**  

**(1)** Proven Product Ownership with 5+ years in Product Owner/Manager roles, ideally in a fast-paced marketplace product environment.  

**(2)** Ability to interpret data, derive insights, and make informed product decisions; experience with analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Amplitude) is a plus.  

**(3)** Experience working with data teams to leverage insights for product improvements.  

**(4)** Understanding digital product development to collaborate effectively with engineers.  

**(5)** Cross-functional leadership to align and lead UX, Data, CRO, and Engineering teams.
  

**(6)** Work seamlessly with executives, marketing, and customer experience teams.  

**(7)** Agile & Scrum expertise, hands-on experience managing backlogs, writing user stories, and facilitating sprints.  

  

**Nice-to-Haves:**  

**(1)** Experience in payments technology products.
  

**(2)** Working on products that span multiple regions and languages, including markets with diverse regulatory environments.  

**(3)** Hands-on experience running experiments to validate product decisions.
  

**(4)** Hands-on work with API integrations: Experience working with API-driven products, third-party integrations, and platform-based ecosystems.
  

**(5)** Exposure to Machine Learning & AI in Product Development: Understanding of how AI and data science can be leveraged to improve user experience and business performance.

**Not to brag but here is what's our offer to you:**  

* Competitive compensation package;
* Fully covered private medical insurance;
* Yearly bonuses for home office and wellness;
* Annual bonuses based on performance (aka 13th salary);
* Annual team integration activity (our last, November 2024 in Seville);
* 20 working paid days off per year;
* Working remotely;
* Your budget for learning and development initiatives.
Did we make you curious? Apply for the role and we'll get in touch soon !

title: Senior UX Designer
description:
**På Prevas löser vi problem – med teknik och påhittighet. Vi ser möjligheter där andra ser hinder, och genom innovativa lösningar skapar vi verklig förändring. Från att hjälpa hjärtsjuka mäta sitt EKG på distans till att effektivisera stålindustrins produktion – vi gör skillnad.**

*Som UX Designer på Prevas i Malmö blir du en del i ett team av erfarna och engagerade designers med en gemensam passion för innovation.* *Hos oss får du arbeta i hela designprocessen – från research och koncept till färdiga lösningar. Våra projekt drivs både inhouse och ute hos kund i cross-funktionella team.*

**Hello You!**  

Vi söker dig som är Senior UX/UI-designer med ett sinne för att skapa användarvänliga, inkluderande och estetiskt tilltalande lösningar. Du är van att arbeta både självständigt och i team, och har en stark förmåga att lyssna in både kunder och användarnas behov och omsätta dem till konkreta lösningar. För rollen söker vi dig som arbetat minst 5 år som Senior UX/Visuell Designer.

* Du är van att jobba i agila projekt, nära tillsammans med projektledare, kravställare, produktägare och utvecklare
* Du kan på ett självständigt sätt planera och driva UX-processen framåt
* Du har en bred verktygslåda och metoder att använda dig av för att genomföra projekt från idé till färdigt gränssnitt
* Du är duktig på att presentera och motivera din design för kollegor, kunder och kravställare
* Du inspirerar till kreativitet och delar gärna med dig av din kunskap
* Du tycker det är kul att jobba med olika tekniska plattformar och skärmupplösningar
* Du behärskar både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* 

**Hello Team Player!**  

För oss är gemenskap och delaktighet viktigt där alla bidrar med sin kunskap i en lärande miljö. Trivs du att arbeta i en familjär atmosfär där vägen från idé till handling är kort och möjligheten att göra skillnad stor så är Prevas något för dig. Vi erbjuder spännande uppdrag, trevliga kollegor, en inspirerande arbetsmiljö och individuella utvecklingsplaner. Vi strävar alltid efter att finna rätt upplägg som passar just dig för att få ihop livspusslet.

  

**Hello Next Step!**  

Du är varmt välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Helena Gautam på **helena.gautam@prevas.se** om du vill veta mer.


Vi går igenom ansökningar och håller intervjuer löpande, så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan! När du ansöker ser vi gärna att du bifogar din portfolio. Tillträde sker snarast enligt överenskommelse.


Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser

  

**Prevas värdegrund**  

*Gemensamma kärnvärden är nyckeln till vår framgång. De banar vägen för bättre kommunikation och samarbete, minskar behovet av detaljerade regler och förordningar och gör vår organisation mer agil och dynamisk. Att dela värderingar ger större frihet att agera utan detaljerade regler. Att dela gemensamma värderingar betyder inte att vi alla är lika. Vi älskar skillnader och främjar mångfald. Vi tror att unika individer är viktiga för att skapa starka och framgångsrika team. Våra värderingar styr vårt dagliga beteende gentemot både kunder och medarbetare. När vi respekterar våra värderingar och uppträder i enlighet med dem, ger vi uttryck för vår företagskultur. På Prevas sammanfattar vi våra värden i akronymen BOAT – Business driven, Open-minded, Active och Team player.*
company_description: Hello Possibility Vi löser problem. Många skulle nog påstå att vi gör det med olika tekniska lösningar – och visst stämmer det. Fast ännu viktigare är kanske påhittigheten. Det som Prevas egentligen h

title: Loyalty Campaign Manager - Sthlm
description:
Are you passionate about driving commercially successful campaigns that enhance customer loyalty and retention? If so, this is your opportunity to take ownership of loyalty initiatives and campaign performance within the Spenn ecosystem!



At Strawberry, we are redefining loyalty with the launch of Spenn, our new loyalty currency in partnership with Norwegian Air Shuttle. We are creating a seamless and rewarding experience for our members, where they can earn and redeem rewards faster than ever before. As our Loyalty Campaign Manager, you will be at the heart of this transformation—developing campaigns and content strategies that not only engage and convert users but also drive long-term loyalty.



What you will be doing:



In this role, you will be responsible for creating, adapting, and optimizing campaigns, offers and content that clearly communicates Strawberry’s loyalty offerings within the Spenn app and website. You will ensure that our campaigns are compelling, data-driven, and strategically aligned to increase engagement, encourage repeat business, and enhance retention.


* Lead and manage loyalty-focused campaigns—from brief creation to execution, ensuring seamless collaboration between teams.
* Develop and refine content strategies that effectively communicate member benefits, rewards, and incentives within Spenn.
* Leverage data insights to optimize messaging and identify opportunities for increased engagement, retention, and customer lifetime value.
* Create content tailored to different customer segments, ensuring a personalized and engaging loyalty experience.
* Collaborate cross-functionally with Brand & Content Marketing, E-commerce, UX, and Digital Sales to ensure consistent messaging and optimal positioning of loyalty campaigns.
* Track and analyze content performance, using A/B testing and insights to continuously improve campaign effectiveness.
* Educate and inspire internal stakeholders about how content and loyalty work together to drive engagement and business growth.

Who we are looking for:



We believe you are a strategic and commercially driven loyalty expert with a strong understanding of customer engagement and retention. You have experience leading projects and initiatives that enhance loyalty programs, ensuring campaigns are well-executed, data-driven, and commercially effective. With a keen eye for customer behavior and business growth, you know how to design and optimize campaigns that resonate with both new and returning customers, ultimately strengthening brand loyalty and increasing long-term value.



We believe you have:


* Experience in content creation and campaign execution, within loyalty, CRM, e-commerce, or digital marketing.
* A strong understanding of loyalty and retention strategies, including how to increase engagement and customer lifetime value.
* Project management experience, with the ability to lead campaigns from start to finish.
* A data-driven mindset, using insights to refine messaging, segment audiences, and improve conversion rates.
* Hands-on experience with content performance tracking, A/B testing, and optimization.
* Knowledge of SEO, content analytics, and CMS systems (we use Contentful).
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, as you’ll be working closely with multiple teams.
* Fluency in Norwegian or Swedish, as well as English (additional Nordic languages are a plus!).

What we can offer you:


* A flat organization with trust and autonomy in your work. We are rebels that support innovation without imposing strict corporate rules.
* The chance to be part of a passionate team with exceptional colleagues and an inclusive culture, that believes every stay should be a story worth telling.
* Plenty of social events including smaller gatherings with your team and huge get-togethers with the whole Strawberry family!
* Great benefits! In addition to our collective agreement, we also offer staff discounts and friends & family rates at our 200+ hotels.

Details:



This role will be part of our Loyalty team. You will collaborate closely with the two Campaign & Content Specialists that we are also recruiting—one for Brand & Content Marketing and one for E-commerce.



We offer a hybrid workplace, for this position, your base could be either in Oslo or Stockholm, hence the two ads. Some travel may be required between our main offices in Stockholm and Oslo.



Sounds interesting?



We'd love to hear from you! Interviews will be held on a rolling basis, don’t wait to submit your application!
company_description: We are Strawberry. With over 225 hotels, 120 restaurants, 20 spas and more, we create thousands of experiences every day. Join a world of experiences!

title: Product Coordinator, Content
description:
Är du en nyfiken bokmal med ett skarpt öga för detaljer och en förmåga att organisera och koordinera projekt? Då har vi den perfekta rollen för dig!


Som **Product Coordinator, Content** på BookBeat, kommer du att bli en del av vårt Contentteam med **fokus på att möjliggöra att innehåll kommer till liv via de features vi utvecklar.**

 **Rollen:**  

I rollen som **Product Coordinator, Content** kommer du att vara en **central del i att utveckla vårt CMS, förlagsportal och andra delar av vår Roadmap**. Tillsammans med produktägare, UX/QA-specialister och utvecklare kommer du att arbeta för att säkerställa att dessa plattformar vidareutvecklas och optimeras. Du kommer att vara **in****volverad i hela processen, från att ta fram enklare skisser, dokumentera processen och slutligen genomföra testning av de nya funktionerna**.

 **Dina ansvarsområden innefattar bl.a. att:**

  

* Koordinera och optimera projekten vi arbetar på.
* Arbeta tillsammans med tvärfunktionella team för att samla feedback, användardata och förbättringar.
* Fullfölja research och dokumentation.
* Ge support till övriga specialprojekt som våra Content-team genomför.

**Är du den vi letar efter?**  

Vi söker dig som har **ett starkt intresse för böcker och projektledning**. Du trivs i en snabb och föränderlig miljö där du får möjlighet att bidra med egna idéer och lösningar. För att lyckas i rollen är det **viktigt att du är kommunikativ, noggrann och har förmågan att leda projekt genom hela utvecklingscykeln**. Har du ett särskilt intresse för UX, testning eller något liknande är det ett plus.

**Vi söker dig som:**

  

* Precis har påbörjat din karriär eller har ett eller ett par års erfarenhet av produktkoordinering inom webbutveckling, e-handel eller innehållshantering
* Är van att arbeta med projektledningsverktyg för Software.
* Har kunskap om UX/UI-design, testning och projektledning.
* Är noggrann, självgående och bra på att kommunicera.
* Behärskar både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta Hannah Wolfson, Head of People Operations på hannah.wolfson@bookbeat.com

**Som anställd på BookBeat AB erbjuds du ett förmånspaket som inkluderar:**


30 dagar semester per år  

ITP1-tjänstepension  

TGL (tjänstegrupplivförsäkring), TFA (trygghetsförsäkring vid arbetsskada) & tjänstereseförsäkring  

Årligt friskvårdsbidrag  

‍️ Veckovis friskvårdstimme  

Arbetsutrustning (dator och telefon) samt abonnemang  

BookBeat prenumeration


**Utöver våra förmåner erbjuder vi dig också:**


En stabil och hållbar balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi använder flextid och jobbar 37,9 timmar per vecka  

Ett kontor i centrala Stockholm  

‍️ … inklusive tillgång till ett fullt utrustat gym med bastu! Vi arrangerar också ett gäng roliga aktiviteter med koppling till hälsa och välmående  

Flexibilitet i form av flexibla arbetstimmar och vår hybrid-policy när det kommer till arbete från kontoret/hemmet  

Möjligheten att växa i din roll och karriär, inklusive utmanande och lärorika arbetsuppgifter samt andra möjligheter till utveckling  

Roliga aktiviteter tillsammans med dina kollegor! På BookBeat får du ta del av veckovisa "Friday afternoon mingles", månatliga företagsfrukostar och andra härliga arbetsrelaterade aktiviteter regelbundet tillsammans med hela företaget  

Möjligheten att utforska projekt du inte har tid för i ditt dagliga arbete under våra Hack Days  

Kunskapsdelningsmöjligheter, exempelvis under våra veckovisa "Friday demos" tillsammans med hela företaget där olika team delar vad de har jobbat på, jobbar på eller kommer jobba på. Kunskapsdelning är också en viktig del av vårt dagliga arbete!  

Möjligheten att ta med din fyrbenta hundvän till jobbet (och att gosa med hundar på kontoret)! Vi har nyligen introducerat ett hundrum på vårt Stockholmskontor  

(Sist men inte minst) ett härligt och kompetent team och chef som kommer stötta dig genom din anställning!

**Om oss**  

År 2015 påbörjade vi vår resa mot målet att erbjuda Europas ledande tjänst för digitala böcker, och 2016 lanserade vi till allmänheten. Nu, runt 9 år efter vår breda lansering, används BookBeat av över 1 miljon användare varje månad. Vi är ett ständigt växande företag inom Bonnierkoncernen och alla medlemmar som är del av vår resa har möjlighet att påverka vår utveckling – både på kort och lång sikt.  

  

Idag består Team BookBeat av 160 nyfikna och engagerade "doers". Är du intresserad av att bli en del av vårt team? Underbart! Våra anställda är experter på många olika områden, men vi har fyra kärnvärderingar som enar oss alla:

  

Var fantastisk på det du gör  

Dela det du vet och kan  

Nyfikenhet för våra användare och oss  

Bygg Team BookBeat



Med andra ord: vi vill att våra medarbetare kontinuerligt ska djupdyka i och utvecklas inom sina kompetensområden, men också att de delar den kunskapen med sina kollegor – vi är alla del av Team BookBeat och samarbetar (oftast mycket) dagligen! Vi söker också medarbetare som är genuint nyfikna på våra användare samt på vår resa och organisation, en nyfikenhet som driver oss till att alltid testa nya saker i vår tjänst och att låta våra användare visa oss om vi är på rätt väg. Sist men definitivt inte minst vill vi att våra anställda ska bidra till Team BookBeats vardagliga samarbete och välmående – som redan nämnt är vi alla del av ett större team, ett team som vi vill ska må bra och ha kul på jobbet, något vi alla bidrar till på olika sätt.

title: Senior UI Designer – E-commerce Focus
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled **Senior UI Designer** with **UX Expertise** and strong visual design background to join our Experience Design team. This role is ideal for someone who excels at crafting **high-quality, visually compelling interfaces** and has extensive experience in **e-commerce design, Figma, and design systems**. You will report to the **Head of Experience Design**, and collaborate closely with our **Experience Consulting team** to create exceptional digital experiences.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

**Visual and UI Design Excellence:**

* Design pixel-perfect, visually striking user interfaces that elevate the user experience.
* Maintain a strong focus on aesthetics, typography, color theory, and layout.
* Ensure consistency across projects by contributing to and refining design systems.
* Develop engaging and scalable UI solutions tailored to e-commerce experiences.

#### **UX & User-Centered Design**

* Create intuitive and seamless user flows that enhance the overall shopping experience.
* Conduct usability testing and iterate based on user feedback to improve designs.
* Optimize e-commerce interfaces for conversion, engagement, and retention.
* Ensure designs align with user research insights and client business objectives.

#### **Prototyping & Interaction Design**

* Build and refine interactive prototypes in Figma to communicate design concepts.
* Ensure smooth interaction patterns and micro-interactions that enhance usability.

#### **E-commerce & Design Systems**

* Apply expertise in e-commerce UI/UX best practices to optimize user flows, product pages, and checkout experiences.
* Work with complex design systems (e.g., Alokai Storefront UI 2.5+, Material UI, or similar).
* Ensure that designs adhere to accessibility standards (WCAG) and are responsive across devices.

#### **Collaboration & Communication**

* Work closely with UX designers, developers, and stakeholders to bring design visions to life.
* Confidently present design concepts and rationale to clients and team members.
* Iterate on designs based on user testing, data insights, and client feedback.
* 

**Qualifications:**

* **5+ years** of experience in UI/UX design with strong visual skills.
* Your **portfolio** should showcase exceptional visual design across digital platforms and a proven track record in designing e-commerce interfaces that drive engagement and conversions.
* Advanced **Figma** skills, including components, variables, auto layout, and prototyping.
* Experience with **design systems**, UI principles, and best practices.
* Experience with user research, usability testing, and UX optimization.
* Basic knowledge of HTML & CSS is a plus.
* Experience designing for **accessibility (WCAG standards)**.
* Strong communication skills with the ability to articulate design decisions effectively.
* Fluency in **English and Swedish** is required; Norwegian is a plus.

 **Personal Attributes:**

* **Creative Mindset:** Ability to think creatively and come up with innovative design solutions.
* **Team Player:** Enjoys working collaboratively with others and contributing to a positive team environment. We are a team that likes to have fun :)
* **Proactive:** Self-motivated and able to manage your workload effectively, with a willingness to take on new challenges.
* **Client-Focused:** Comfortable in client-facing roles and able to adapt designs to meet client needs and preferences.
  


**What We Offer:**

* **Exciting projects** with major clients where your designs will have real impact.
* A strong culture characterised by openness, teamwork, excellence, and fun.
* Flexible work environment with access to **modern offices in Stockholm** and remote work options.
* You will be working closely with amazing design experts, offering opportunities for continuous learning and professional growth within the company. Also, you will have access to educational resources and workshops to expand your skills in UX/UI design and related fields.
* **Inclusive Environment:** We welcome diverse backgrounds and perspectives, valuing what makes each team member unique.
  


**Join Us!**
  

If you are a creative, detail-oriented designer with a passion for high-quality visuals and user-centered design, we want to hear from you! A portfolio is required. Please submit your application along with a brief note on why you’re the perfect fit for this role.

title: Loyalty Campaign Manager - Sthlm
description:
We are Strawberry. With over 245 hotels, 120 restaurants, 20 spas and more, we create thousands of experiences every day. With urban Comfort Hotel®, warm Quality Hotel™, stylish Clarion Hotel® and cosy Home Hotel and more than 40 unique independent hotels, our guests can pick and choose. Our team of 20,000 passionate individuals from more than 120 countries is what makes us grow! Strawberry is built on our core values: energy, courage and enthusiasm.
Are you passionate about driving commercially successful campaigns that enhance customer loyalty and retention? If so, this is your opportunity to take ownership of loyalty initiatives and campaign performance within the Spenn ecosystem!



At Strawberry, we are redefining loyalty with the launch of Spenn, our new loyalty currency in partnership with Norwegian Air Shuttle. We are creating a seamless and rewarding experience for our members, where they can earn and redeem rewards faster than ever before. As our Loyalty Campaign Manager, you will be at the heart of this transformation—developing campaigns and content strategies that not only engage and convert users but also drive long-term loyalty.


### **What you will be doing:**



In this role, you will be responsible for creating, adapting, and optimizing campaigns, offers and content that clearly communicates Strawberry’s loyalty offerings within the Spenn app and website. You will ensure that our campaigns are compelling, data-driven, and strategically aligned to increase engagement, encourage repeat business, and enhance retention.


* Lead and manage loyalty-focused campaigns—from brief creation to execution, ensuring seamless collaboration between teams.
* Develop and refine content strategies that effectively communicate member benefits, rewards, and incentives within Spenn.
* Leverage data insights to optimize messaging and identify opportunities for increased engagement, retention, and customer lifetime value.
* Create content tailored to different customer segments, ensuring a personalized and engaging loyalty experience.
* Collaborate cross-functionally with Brand & Content Marketing, E-commerce, UX, and Digital Sales to ensure consistent messaging and optimal positioning of loyalty campaigns.
* Track and analyze content performance, using A/B testing and insights to continuously improve campaign effectiveness.
* Educate and inspire internal stakeholders about how content and loyalty work together to drive engagement and business growth.

### **Who we are looking for:**



We believe you are a strategic and commercially driven loyalty expert with a strong understanding of customer engagement and retention. You have experience leading projects and initiatives that enhance loyalty programs, ensuring campaigns are well-executed, data-driven, and commercially effective. With a keen eye for customer behavior and business growth, you know how to design and optimize campaigns that resonate with both new and returning customers, ultimately strengthening brand loyalty and increasing long-term value.



We believe you have:


* Experience in content creation and campaign execution, within loyalty, CRM, e-commerce, or digital marketing.
* A strong understanding of loyalty and retention strategies, including how to increase engagement and customer lifetime value.
* Project management experience, with the ability to lead campaigns from start to finish.
* A data-driven mindset, using insights to refine messaging, segment audiences, and improve conversion rates.
* Hands-on experience with content performance tracking, A/B testing, and optimization.
* Knowledge of SEO, content analytics, and CMS systems (we use Contentful).
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, as you’ll be working closely with multiple teams.
* Fluency in Norwegian or Swedish, as well as English (additional Nordic languages are a plus!).

### **What we can offer you:**


* A flat organization with trust and autonomy in your work. We are rebels that support innovation without imposing strict corporate rules.
* The chance to be part of a passionate team with exceptional colleagues and an inclusive culture, that believes every stay should be a story worth telling.
* Plenty of social events including smaller gatherings with your team and huge get-togethers with the whole Strawberry family!
* Great benefits! In addition to our collective agreement, we also offer staff discounts and friends & family rates at our 200+ hotels.

### **Details:**



This role will be part of our Loyalty team. You will collaborate closely with the two Campaign & Content Specialists that we are also recruiting—one for Brand & Content Marketing and one for E-commerce.



We offer a hybrid workplace, for this position, your base could be either in Oslo or Stockholm, hence the two ads. Some travel may be required between our main offices in Stockholm and Oslo.


### **Sounds interesting?**



We'd love to hear from you! Interviews will be held on a rolling basis, don’t wait to submit your application!
company_description: We are Strawberry. With over 225 hotels, 120 restaurants, 20 spas and more, we create thousands of experiences every day. Join a world of experiences!

title: Business Analysts till Visma Spcs
description:
*Har du en passion för produktutveckling, älskar att leverera värde och produktupplevelser till kunder, och trivs med att jobba projektdrivet? Perfekt! Vi på Visma Spcs söker just nu flera Business Analysts till vår produktutvecklingsavdelning.*


Vi lever i specialintressets tidsålder då företagande kan vara, ja lite vad som helst. På gatan, i skogen, på internet, hos frisören, i drömmar och fantasier eller mitt framför näsan på en - passioner finns överallt. Men få tänker på att det faktiskt kan bli en affärsidé. Med molnbaserade ekonomisystem ger vi framtidens företagare allt de behöver inom bokföring, fakturering och löner. Vi gör detta för att vi är övertygade om att det får samhället och individer att växa och skapa ett företagsliv fullt av passion. Vi vill helt enkelt inspirera Sverige att hitta modet och det första steget - för att leva ut sina passioner genom företagande med oss.

### **️ Vad kommer du att göra?**

* Samarbeta tätt med produktägare, UX designers, ett gäng business analysts och utvecklare för att skapa lösningar som gör företagandet både lättare och roligare.

* Vara en nyckelspelare i utvecklingskedjan: ta fram lösningsförslag, prioritera och driva utvecklingsarbetet tillsammans med teamet, samt planera för leverans till produktion.

* Stödja produktägare med att sätta prioriteringar på roadmaps.


### **Är det dig vi beskriver?**

* Du är en mästare på att kommunicera på både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift och är duktig på att bygga goda relationer med såväl kollegor som stakeholders

* Du känner engagemang för att förstå kundernas behov och utmaningar och tar med dig det in i utvecklingsarbetet för att förbättra våra produkter.

* Du är grym på projektledning och uppskattar struktur


- Som person är du kreativ, idérik och tar gärna till ny teknik för att lösa problem - du är en doer som fokuserar på att få saker på plats

* Du har en utbildning inom systemvetenskap eller dyl i bagaget och har minst två års erfarenhet från liknande roll inom mjukvaruutveckling.

* Du har koll på mjukvaruutvecklingsprocesser och förstår vad som är viktigt för att lyckas i rollen som Business Analyst.


### **Vad får du hos oss?**

* Möjligheten att utvecklas tillsammans med entusiastiska kollegor i ett av Sveriges ledande SaaS-bolag, och som dessutom är en del av Europas största tech-koncern. Vi är stolta över att ha blivit utnämnda till Karriärföretag 2025!

* En hybridkultur som erbjuder dig flexibilitet i din vardag, där du har möjligheten att jobba från något av våra härliga kontor eller delvis på distans.


- "My Competence Day" - dedikerade dagar för din personliga och professionella utveckling.

* När vi frågar våra medarbetare varför de trivs hos oss brukar de flesta svara företagskulturen, engagemanget bland kollegorna i kombination med möjligheterna att utvecklas. Hos oss får du arbeta med omkring 500 kollegor på en arbetsplats med massvis av möjligheter!

### **Skicka in din ansökan idag!**


Vi gör löpande urval och kallar till intervjuer, så vänta inte – ansök nu! Senast den 9/3 2025 vill vi ha din ansökan. Om du har frågor, tveka inte att höra av dig till Gustav Bergqvist. Team manager på Visma Spcs utvecklingsavdelning: gustav.bergqvist@visma.com .
  

Tester och bakgrundskontroller förekommer som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.


  
Department
Software Development
Platser
Göteborg, Växjö
Distansarbete
Hybridarbete
Application deadline
9 mars 2025
Competencies
Software Development, Agile

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
This is your chance to join a fast-growing brand that’s redefining the sleep industry with cutting-edge anti-snoring and sleep solutions. Since launching in early 2024, they’ve scaled to multiple seven figures per month - and they’re just getting started.
   

  

 Now they’re looking for a talented and driven UI/UX Designer who thrives in a high-performance environment and is eager to make an impact. We want to hear from you if you have an exceptional eye for aesthetics, a strong foundation in marketing principles, and the ability to create seamless, visually stunning web experiences.
   

  

 YOUR MISSION
   

  

 To design intuitive, high-performing web experiences and marketing assets that captivate users and drive conversions. You’ll combine creative vision, technical expertise, and strategic thinking to craft digital designs that stand out.
   

  

 This is a fully remote, full-time position.
   

  

**What’s In It For You**
* Creative Ownership: Work in an environment that values bold ideas and encourages experimentation
* High-Impact Work: Shape the visual identity of a rapidly scaling eCommerce brand
* Growth Opportunities: Be part of a fast-growing team with long-term career potential
* Remote Flexibility: Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere


 WHAT YOU’RE GETTING INTO
   

  

* Design high-converting landing pages, product pages, and customer portals in Figma
* Develop wireframes, high-fidelity mockups, and prototypes for web and mobile experiences
* Ensure mobile-first, responsive designs for seamless cross-device usability
* Craft intuitive UI/UX solutions that enhance user engagement and conversion rates
* Maintain visual consistency across all digital touchpoints, ensuring brand cohesion
* Design marketing assets, including banners, store icons, display ads, and social media creatives
* Develop product packaging, user manuals, and marketing collateral that align with brand identity
* Provide creative direction, collaborate with marketing and development teams, and oversee design execution to align with business goals


**Who You Are**
* Experience: Minimum 3 years in UI/UX design, specifically in eCommerce (must-have)
* Skills: High proficiency in Figma (wireframing, prototyping, UI kits), Photoshop, Illustrator, or Canva
* Mindset: Creative, proactive, and detail-obsessed with a strong problem-solving approach
* Design Thinking: Deep understanding of user behavior, psychology, and CRO principles
* Work Ethic: Driven by high standards, takes ownership, and thrives in fast-paced environments
* Aesthetic Vision: Keen eye for design quality and the ability to craft visually compelling experiences


**What Success Looks Like**
* 30 Days: You’ve mastered brand guidelines, designed key landing pages, and contributed to initial marketing assets
* 60 Days: You’re leading creative projects, optimizing user experiences, and collaborating seamlessly with the team
* 90 Days: You’ve established yourself as a design leader, driving innovation and delivering impactful designs that boost conversions


 READY TO DESIGN THE FUTURE?
   

  

 If you’re passionate about crafting exceptional digital experiences and want to be part of a brand that’s scaling fast, apply now and join us in transforming the sleep industry. Are you ready to shape the future of eCommerce design and craft high-converting digital experiences?

title: Product & Brand Designer
description:
**Shape the future of the Next Generation Crypto Bank**
 Safello is growing fast. We’re evolving our
 **product, brand, and offering** 
 , and we’re looking for a
 **Product & Brand Designer** 
 to play a central role in that transformation.
   

  

 At Safello,
 **our brand is our product** 
 . Every screen, interaction, and visual detail creates the sense of clarity and trust that we build. We need a designer who is
 **visionary but also hands-on** 
 —someone who sees what’s possible and can take an idea all the way from concept to a polished, seamless experience.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Shape the visual identity of our product, creating a modern, cohesive, and engaging experience.
* Refine and evolve the UI, making sure Safello’s design feels effortless, intuitive, and distinctly our own.
* Bridge brand and product, ensuring that every design choice reinforces clarity, trust, and ease of use.
* Work closely with UX, development, and marketing to bring Safello’s design vision to life across every touchpoint.
* Take ownership of our design system, ensuring a scalable and consistent product experience.
* Explore and push boundaries, finding new ways to make Safello feel unique, innovative, and future-forward.


**Who You Are**
* A product designer with a strong UI and interaction design focus.
* A visionary designer—you see the bigger picture but love to get hands-on with the details.
* Experience with fintech, crypto, or other trust-based products is a plus, but not a requirement.
* Have designed for products that people love using, preferably in tech, e-commerce, or digital services.
* Detail-oriented—typography, spacing, micro-interactions, and motion matter to you.
* Fluent in modern design tools like Figma, Adobe Suite, and motion/interaction tools.


**Why Join Safello?**
**Your design will shape Safello.** 
 We’re building
 **The Next Generation Crypto Bank** 
 , and you’ll have a key role in defining how it looks and feels.
   

  

* A product-first company. Here, design isn’t just a function—it’s a competitive advantage.
* A culture that values craft. We care about every pixel, every animation, and every interaction.
* A chance to challenge and build the future. We’re not thinking like a traditional bank—we’re building something completely new.
* Embracing AI and its role in design—leveraging AI-driven tools to enhance creativity, efficiency, and innovation.


 Sounds like you? Let’s talk. Or if you know someone who’d be a perfect fit, send them our way.

title: Content Creator
description:
**JOB OPPORTUNITY AT MELYON! : CONTENT CREATOR** 




  





 Melyon, a Swedish skincare brand founded in Stockholm in 2020 by Roger Dupé. With roots in West Africa, the Scandinavian lifestyle brand combines the best from nature and science, to create safe and ethical products with proven results. The skincare line is made with people of color in mind, focusing on conditions commonly found among darker skin tones while still being suitable for most skin types. 
 



 As we transition from startup to scale-up, we are in search of Content Creator to drive expansion efforts and growth in new and existing markets
 



  





 You'll be integral in shaping and communicating our prestigious brand identity within the luxury cosmetics sector. Collaborating closely with our Marketing & Growth team, your primary focus will involve developing our brand, refining our marketing strategy, and enhancing our visual identity. 
 



  





**What will your key responsibilities be?** 




 -        Graphic Design: Create captivating and tailored advertisements for platforms such as Meta, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube. This entails designing visually stunning ads optimized for maximum engagement and conversion.
 



 -        Photo/Film Production: Oversee the entire process from conceptualization to production of photo and video content. Plan and execute photo shoots and filming sessions that effectively capture our brand essence and convey our message.
 



 -        Editing: Skillfully edit and refine image and video content with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring both visual appeal and technical excellence.
 



 -        Technology and Innovation: Harness digital technology and AI to enhance and streamline content production processes. Stay abreast of the latest trends and tools in digital marketing and content creation.
 



  





**What will you need to be successful?** 




  





**Desired requirements:** 




 -        Professional Experience: Demonstrated expertise in graphic design, photography, and videography, with a proven track record of managing projects from conception to completion.
 



 -        Technical Proficiency: Mastery of advanced editing tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Indesign, and Premiere Pro.
 



 -        Creative and Strategic Aptitude: Blend of strong creative flair and strategic acumen to design content that captivates and converts effectively.
 



 -        Language Skills: Excellent proficiency in both Swedish and English languages, crucial for seamless collaboration within our international team.
 



 -        Forward-Thinking and Innovative: Passion for exploring how digital technology and AI can revolutionize content creation and marketing strategies.
 



  





 As we embark on an ambitious international expansion phase, we're seeking a creative and visionary Content Creator who shares our passion for diversity, inclusion, lifestyle, and skincare. Your role will be pivotal in shaping and elevating our brand presence globally, resonating with our target audience through compelling content. Expertise in photography and videography, coupled with a knack for creating groundbreaking content and effective ads, is highly valued at Melyon.
 



  





 We prioritize creativity, collaboration, and continual improvement, both in our products and our work processes. 
 



  





 We aspire to drive positive change in our industry with a firm commitment to diversity and inclusion. Here, you'll play a significant role and have the opportunity to shape our future trajectory. 
 



  





**What Melyon Offers?** 




 -        Embrace a culture defined by ambition, joy, and unwavering teamwork!
 




 -        This is a full-time position with an immediate start. 
 




 -        This is a 6 to 12-month project role with potential for extension. The position offers remote work with the option to utilize co-working spaces in Stockholm.
 



  





**If you are a dynamic professional with a passion for beauty, an entrepreneurial spirit, and the drive to make a significant impact, we invite you to join us on this exciting journey!** 




  






 To apply and join the Team
 
**,** 
 submit your CV and cover letter to Work@melyon.se.
 



  





 We eagerly await your application!

title: Senior Packaging & Concept Design Consultant to H&M Beauty – freelance assignment
description:
**Job Description**
**We are looking for a senior Packaging & Concept designer,** 
 this is a freelance/consultant assignment for 2025, starting asap. You will work approximately 50-70%
 **on site** 
 in our H&M Beauty office in the centre of Stockholm. You will be part of the Beauty marketing team, while your closest immediate collaborators and stakeholders will be with the Design team and Private label assortment team.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Work closely within the creative design team to develop new concepts and commercial designs for packaging-related projects across makeup, fragrance, beauty tools, and/or miniature beauty products
* Sketch and design packaging including primary components and secondary boxes
* Present work to related stakeholders and teams within the Beauty department and incorporate feedback as needed
* Research trends in packaging and across beauty/fashion landscape to stay up-to-date on new trends


**Who You Are**
**We look for someone bringing the following experiences and strengths:**
* 4-6+ years experience with packaging design for design agencies and/or in-house brands
* Strong ability to develop unique concepts and expressions within packaging based on trends and according to brief/brand guidelines
* Experience with beauty packaging and/or strong interest in the beauty sector
* Highly skilled with all Adobe platforms especially Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop and main color-matching systems
* Demonstrate ability to sketch in 2D and render products and packaging components to demonstrate proof of concept
* Extremely attentive to detail and self-sufficient, you must be able to manage projects independently, timelines and communication with necessary stakeholders with ease
* A strong collaborator and ability to interpret feedback from various stakeholders into strong design solutions
* Passionate about and updated on latest global retail, beauty, fashion, and/or packaging trends
* Fluent in English (both written and spoken)


**Who We Are**
**H&M BEAUTY** 
 is capturing the enormous potential of the Beauty market by becoming the world's most fashionable beauty destination
 **.** 
 On this journey, we have reimagined our entire private label portfolio within makeup and tools. And most recently, we successfully relaunched our own fragrance line. We also add trending external beauty brands to our offer, enabling our customers to complement their fashion looks with top beauty products.
   

  

**JOIN US**
 This is an approximately 1year temporary consultant position of 50-70% work/week
 **on site** 
 in our H&M Beauty office in the centre at  Jakobsbergsgatan, Stockholm. Please note: This is NOT a remote work assignment!
   

  

 Please apply as soon as possible, latest by
 **2nd March** 
**2025** 
**,** 
**with CV and packaging design portfolio** 
 (max 10mb/uploaded document or compressed files).
 **Please note: we will only be able to assess applications including portfolio.** 
 All documents should be in English and interviews will start immediately!
 *(For internal candidates, please remember to initiate a dialogue with your current manager before applying.)*
 Due to private data policy we only accept applications through our career page.
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Content Designer
description:
***Content Designer***




  





**Application Deadline:** 
 March 2, 2025
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 



  





 We are looking for a Content Designer to join Haglöfs Brand & Marketing Department in Stockholm, Sweden.
 



  





 At Haglöfs, our mission is to enhance the quality of life, not only for our consumers through the exceptional outdoor products we produce but also for our employees. Working at Haglöfs is more than just a job; it's an opportunity to merge a life filled with inspiring colleagues and exciting tasks with your passion for the outdoors.
 



  





 Haglöfs is set on a global growth-, and transformation journey. As part of a new creative in-house team the Content Designer is central to creating strong commercial-, and brand building campaigns and content.
 



  





 The Content Designer at Haglöfs will foremost create and tailor consumer centric content for our digital platforms. With digital first approach the designer will lead the design direction and execution of campaigns and content with high focus on securing brand alignment and excellence.
 



  





 The role will create engaging content for the website, campaign sites, social media, and other digital channels. The Content Designer will ensure the visual and interactive elements are optimized for our digital audiences while maintaining brand consistency and progressiveness. By crafting dynamic, platform-specific designs, the Content Designer will play a crucial role in amplifying Haglöfs’ campaigns in the digital space.
 



  





 Haglöfs is a dynamic and global organization, where teamwork and passion are key factors for our success. As Haglöfs is set on a progressive global growth and transformation journey the role requires strong winning attitude and creative leadership skills.
 



  





 The consumer is our focus and central to everything we do. Therefor the role requires a deep understanding of the brand and various segments of outdoor consumers.
 



 The position is based at our HQ in Alvik, Stockholm and will report directly to the Head of Marketing.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Be a leading player in the creative team and take a central role in concept, campaign and content creation.
* With progressive approach create content based on our brand platform.
* Design engaging content for websites, campaign microsites, social media, and other digital platforms.
* Develop interactive and visually compelling assets, such as banners, animations, GIFs, and carousel posts.
* Adapt seasonal campaign designs for digital-first platforms, ensuring consistency with overarching campaign themes.
* Ensure all designs are optimized for accessibility, and user experience.
* Provide creative support to e-commerce and marketing teams for promotional events and product launches.
* Develop templates for recurring digital content needs to streamline processes.
* Use AI tools and design software features to enhance productivity and creativity.



  





**Skills & Requirements** 




**The ideal candidate will bring:** 



* Experience in outdoor or lifestyle brands and a passion for the outdoor industry.
* Proven experience in digital design, preferably in a content-focused or in-house role for a minimum of 3 years.
* Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects) and Figma
* Experience designing for various digital platforms, including social media, web, and mobile-first experiences.
* Ability to create motion graphics, animations, and interactive elements to enhance engagement as well as film editing skills.
* Strong understanding of UX/UI principles and how they apply to visual storytelling.
* Knowledge of optimizing designs for web performance.
* Awareness of digital design trends and the ability to implement them innovatively.
* Familiarity with HTML/CSS or web design tools is a plus.
* Skilled in AI tools and design software.
* Fluency in both English and Swedish.
* Portfolio aligned with creative esthetics of brand.



  





 Does this sound like you and are you interested to know more? Just reach out and we will connect!
 



  





 Do you want more insight to the Haglöfs brand before applying, pls visit www.haglofs.com
 



  





 We review applications continuously and application deadline is 2nd of March. Pls apply with Cover Letter and Portfolio.
 



  





 We are looking forward to talking to you!
 



  





**About the company** 




*Haglöfs is all about improving the quality of life. Both for consumers, through the outstanding outdoor products we produce, and for our employees.* 




  





*In other terms, Haglöfs is more than a job. It’s an opportunity to combine a life filled with inspiring colleagues and exciting tasks with your outdoor interests. If this sounds like life-quality to you, check out our job openings and do not hesitate to apply.* 




  





**Contact Person** 




 Clara Tronet Guillon
 



 Clara.Guillon@haglofs.se

title: Design Director (Design Foundation)
description:
Mentimeter is an engagement tool with a clear goal in mind. To turn presentations into conversations. Through real-time interactivity and clear visualizations, we get people to participate, engage and become more productive. Transforming all those passive meetings, airless classrooms and drawn out trainings into valuable and memorable moments.
   

  

 We truly believe that you achieve the best results by doing things together. And that successful leaders need to adopt a curious and collaborative mindset in order to get there. So with you at Mentimeter, you’ll be a big part of the ambition to help over 1 billion people listen, learn and work better together.
   

  

 As a Product Design Director for our Design Foundation area, you will shape and lead all aspects of Mentimeter’s enabling design functions, including our design system, accessibility practice, content design, localization and design operations. You will partner closely with design, product and engineering peers across the organization to ensure teams and individuals have the guidance, frameworks, and support needed to create cohesive and high-quality user experiences.
   

  

 You will rely on a mix of qualitative and quantitative insights to inform decisions about the evolution and implementation of our design foundation. Together with the Design Leadership Team, you will set a clear vision, define an operating model for these enabling functions, and ensure that they effectively support both our core and commercial product areas.
   

  

 In this role, you will also be responsible for the career development of diverse design specialists, such as design system designers, accessibility experts, and content designers. You will manage, coach and mentor them to create meaningful impact and grow in their careers, ensuring that Mentimeter’s design foundation continues to advance our overall product experience.
   

  

 Areas of responsibility
   

  

 This is an existing position that is currently held by an interim consultant, and we are looking for someone who can join as a full time employee.
   

  

 Strategic Leadership
   

  

* Define, communicate, and execute a compelling vision for the Design Foundation area at Mentimeter.
* Establish strategies, goals, and metrics for the enabling functions (design system, accessibility, and content design) that elevate the quality and consistency of our product experiences.
* Collaborate with cross-functional leaders in Product, Engineering, and beyond to integrate foundational design practices and standards throughout the organization.
* Ensure the direction for our design foundation is clearly articulated, forward-thinking, and consistently applied, helping all teams deliver seamless user experiences.
* Drive and evolve design operations initiatives—such as career frameworks and ways of working—together with the Design Leadership Team.


 People Leadership
   

  

* Lead, inspire, and coach a multidisciplinary area of specialists within the design craft as a design leader and manager
* Oversee career growth and development frameworks, providing individualized mentorship and guidance.
* Foster a collaborative environment where each team member is empowered to innovate, take ownership, and continuously refine their craft.
* Partner with the broader design organization to ensure consistency, share learnings, and maintain a strong, supportive design culture.


 Craft Leadership
   

  

* Serve as an active member of the Design Leadership Team, championing best practices for design, ux writing, accessibility, and brand across Mentimeter’s products.
* Lead cross-area design initiatives in partnership with other leaders to continuously refine and improve our design standards and processes.
* Develop and maintain a cohesive design language, ensuring it evolves in response to user needs, technological advances, and the strategic direction of the company.
* Continuously gather insights and evaluate the impact of the central using qualitative and quantitative methods.


 So, who are you?
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in design leadership roles, with demonstrated success managing and mentoring diverse design teams (e.g., design systems, accessibility, or content).
* Proven track record of driving impactful design operations initiatives and establishing processes that scale in a fast-paced environment.
* Strong leadership abilities, with the capacity to navigate complex challenges and inspire high performance across multiple functions.
* Expertise in leading and evolving design systems and design standards, ensuring consistency and quality across a broad product portfolio.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to clearly articulate decisions and advocate for user-focused design within cross-functional teams.
* A passion for building cohesive, accessible, and user-centric experiences that empower and delight customers.


**What Mentimeter Can Offer**
 At Mentimeter we can offer a diverse and inclusive work environment supported by smart and driven colleagues. We believe in continuous professional development for all of our colleagues and therefore offer access to a leadership program (including external personal coach) and relevant education to ensure that we continue to be state-of-the-art when it comes to innovating and building Mentimeter. Your place will be in a growing company with lots of career opportunities, working on a beloved product used by more than 300 million people. It’s not all about work though, we also offer a very healthy view on work-life balance.
   

  

 All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package, including pension contributions. Learn more about our benefits by visiting our Benefits & Perks page
   

  

**Culture at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter we believe in giving everyone a voice - regardless of who you are. So we build a platform that does just that. Our platform is not only our product but also our organization. A platform where people feel safe, where differences are embraced, a place where you can have fun. We strongly encourage applicants who are people of color, LGBTQ+, women, people with disabilities, and/or formerly incarcerated people, and a college degree is not strictly required. In order to give everyone a voice, we need to be as diverse as our users.
   

  

 Learn more about our culture by visiting our Culture page.
   

  

 Review our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: 3D Rendering & Print Art Specialist
description:
*Bring innovative concepts to life for leading global brands.* 




  





**About Us** 




 Agenthuset Nordic is a 360-marketing agency specializing in concept development, brand identity, graphic design, AI design, web design, video/livestream, field marketing, and space design. Our expertise in space design spans retail environments, including in-store materials, pop-up stores, brand activations, trade fairs, and exhibitions.
 
 We are proud to serve a diverse clientele including renowned brands such as HP, Logitech, GoPro, Nvidia, Starlink, Belkin, Epson, Arlo, Ring, Cricut, and more.
 




  





**Role Overview** 




 We are looking for an experienced 3D & Print Art Specialist with strong skills in 3D visualization, concept development, and print-ready artwork. In this role, you will transform client ideas into high-quality 3D renderings and finalize them as production-ready print files for exhibition stands, pop-up stores, and POS materials.
 



  





 You will work closely with the Head of Creative, Retail Production Manager, and Sales Team to ensure that each design meets high-quality standards and aligns with client expectations. Proficiency in InDesign is essential for this role.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and render realistic 3D concepts based on client briefs.
* Collaborate with the Head of Creative and Retail Project Manager to refine and finalize designs.
* Produce high-quality, print-ready files for materials such as walls, furniture, roll-ups, banners, POS displays, and pop-up store elements.
* Ensure all designs align with brand guidelines and project objectives.
* Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to deadlines.
* Communicate effectively with clients and internal teams to understand requirements and provide updates.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proven experience in print design and 3D rendering for retail spaces, exhibition stands, pop-ups, and POS materials.
* Preferably skilled in Blender for seamless collaboration with the creative team.
* Final Art Design expertise: Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, InDesign) to produce production-ready files.
* Knowledge of materials used in print and display production, including their properties and best applications.
* Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Creative mindset with a passion for innovation and problem-solving.
* Ability to manage multiple projects and work under tight deadlines.
* Proficient in Swedish and English.



  





**What We Offer** 



* An exciting and dynamic work environment with high-profile projects.
* A collaborative and supportive team culture.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* Start Date: Preferably March or as soon as available.
* Location: On-site position in Stockholm, Sweden.



  





**How to Apply** 




 To apply, please submit your CV, cover letter, and portfolio showcasing previous work relevant to this role. Interviews will be conducted on an ongoing basis, so apply as soon as possible! We look forward to reviewing your work and getting to know you.

title: Engineering Manager - Product
description:
We’re a cutting-edge tech-enabled bank on a mission to revolutionize financing for small businesses across 7 markets in northern Europe. Our innovative solutions aim to simplify access to financing and enable growth for small businesses. As we scale, we are now looking for an Engineering Manager to be part of our journey to transform the financial landscape for entrepreneurs.
 



  





**About the role** 




 As an Engineering Manager at Qred, you'll play a crucial role in shaping our organizational design, people management, and way of working. You'll be acting as a development manager for the Revenue domain, which means you will be responsible for leading and supporting our 4 development teams with one Tech Lead per team. Your focus will be to ensure alignment with our methodologies, and fostering collaboration within the Revenue domain. This role calls for a visionary leader with a technical background and a passion for building high-performing teams.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* **People Management:** 
 Oversee performance & staff management of our of engineering teams consisting of ~15 engineers
* **Efficient Way of Working:** 
 Champion methodologies like Agile, Lean, Continuous Delivery, and DevOps to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of our engineering processes. Drive and align our Qred engineering maturity model through all teams
* **Collaboration and Cross-Functional Work:** 
 Foster strong collaboration and communication between Engineering, Product Management, and UX Design
* **Organizational Design:** 
 Define team structures, optimize resource allocation and match personalities, ensure scalability and productivity within the engineering organization
* **Recruitment and Retention:** 
 Lead the recruitment strategy for Engineering for the domain, attracting top talent and fostering a culture of retention
* **Enable Qred:** 
 You will be part of the Revenue Domain and you will have a tight collaboration with CTO, Architects and Chef Revenue Officer. Your focus will be what is best for Qred, then the product department



  





**Requirements** 



* A passion for mentoring and developing engineering talent
* A technical background with broad full-stack experience, preferred language is Javascript (nodejs / react / react native), we don't expect you to code but we expect you to understand the challenges our engineers face in their competence and in the cross-functional team
* You would need two years of experience in a Head of Engineering or development manager role in a sizable organization, preferably in a domain structure organization
* We also see that you have a university engineering degree
* Deep understanding of Agile methodologies, DevOps practices, and modern software development principles
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships across functions
* Alignment with Qred's leadership values: Visionary, Empowering, Lead by example
* We have employees from all parts of the world, English and understanding cultural differences are hard requirements
* You like to meet your department and get to know the persons, we believe in non-formal meetings and chats, therefore you need to like an office-first approach to meet the teams as their office days are spread over the week



  





**One last thing** 




 This is a full-time, permanent position based in our headquarters in Stockholm. Don’t wait to send in your application as we are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. While the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately
 



  





*Qred celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.*

title: E-commerce Specialist/Digital Marketer på konsultbolag
description:
**VILKET ÄR DITT NÄSTA STEG I KARRIÄREN?**
**VILKA ÄR GROW ME?** 

 Grow Me är ett IT-konsultbolag som startades 2016 med syfte att få sina kunder att öka sin digitala försäljning, lönsamhet och effektivisera sin verksamhet. Vi har själva drivit digitala tjänster och försäljning tidigare, genom att vara på den andra sidan affären så förstår vi våra kunder på ett bättre sätt och kan därmed hjälpa dem att göra smartare digitala satsningar. Bakgrunden till vårt namn är att människor ska växa hos oss och det gäller både vi i teamet och våra kunder.
 



 Grow Me har kontor i Stockholm och kunderna finns i Sverige. Genom att utveckla och leverera digital strategi, marknadsföring, e-handelssystem, integrationer, UX, UI samt utbildning hjälper Grow Me andra bolag att uppnå ökad försäljning, lönsamhet och effektivisering.
   




**TEAMET PÅ GROW ME** 

 Idag är vi två personer på Grow Me och vi vill bli fler. Vårt mål är att vara 10 duktiga konsulter.
   




**DIN FRAMTIDA ROLL PÅ GROW ME** 

 I rollen som E-commerce Specialist/Digital Marketer är ditt uppdrag att öka våra kunders försäljning och lönsamhet. Detta gör du genom att analysera data om besökare, trafikkällor, intäkter, kostnader, marknadsföring, annonsering, organisk synlighet, kampanjer, konvertering, köpmönster, sortiment och konkurrenter. Utifrån dina insikter och slutsatser tar du fram rekommendationer på förändringar som du presenterar för kunderna och genomför åt dem. Du kommer att använda dig av verktyg som Google Analytics, Google Looker Studio, Meta Business Manager, Google Ads, Bing Ads, Klaviyo och MailChimp. Du kommer att skriva texter och skapa visuellt material till webbplatser, annonser, sociala medier och kampanjer samt bygga kundresor och skapa kommunikation utifrån dessa.
 



 En stor del i ditt arbete är att ha kontakt med våra kunder för att förstå deras affär, viljor och behov. Ihop med kunderna planerar du och genomför löpande projekt och marknadsföringsinsatser.
 



 Du tar stort eget ansvar för leverans och får både kundernas e-butiker och våra samarbeten med kunderna att växa. I rollen som E-Commerce Specialist förväntas du skapa nya samarbeten och affärer med befintliga och nya kunder.
   




**ROLLENS MÖJLIGHETER OCH ANSVAR** 

 Vi är ett litet snabbväxande bolag där du som konsult får ta mycket ansvar och jobba med utmanande projekt och uppgifter med löpande kundkontakt. Hos Grow Me lär du dig nya verktyg och system samt har möjlighet att utvecklas inom våra andra verksamhetsben utbildning och webbutveckling. Vill du skapa en ny tjänst eller produkt för våra kunder så uppmuntrar vi till det. Som anställd hos Grow Me formar du till viss del din egen roll efter dina intressen och kundernas behov. Det är på det sättet vi bygger Grow Me ihop. Det finns stora utvecklingsmöjligheter och du får tidigt driva egna projekt med tillhörande ansvar.
   




**PERSONLIGA EGENSKAPER, UTBILDNING OCH ERFARENHET** 

 För att lyckas bra i rollen ser vi att du har minst 3 års erfarenhet inom e-handel, gärna med ansvar för att driva försäljning och tillväxt. Du har ett stort inslag av driv, struktur och målinriktning och har haft löpande kundkontakt och trivts med det. Du har kompetens inom flera av Meta Ads, Google Ads, Konverteringsoptimering, Sökmotoroptimering, Analys, Datadriven beslutsfattning, Rapportering, Företagsekonomi, Försäljning och Visuell kommunikation. Du är strukturerad, kommunikativ samt har en förmåga att se helheten i ett projekt. Du har kundens bästa i fokus och trivs med att ta affärsmässigt ansvar och kunna sätta riktningen framåt i ett projekt. Vi har inget formellt krav på någon speciell eftergymnasial utbildning utan bedömer din kompetens, erfarenhet och intresse.
 



 Du har ett stort intresse för e-handel och försäljning i digitala kanaler. Du trivs med att ha kundkontakt och tycker om att genomföra projekt hela vägen från behovsanalys och införsäljning till att hands-on skapa digitala kampanjer och material. Du är komfortabel med att planera ditt eget jobb samt genomföra och följa upp det.
 



 Du gillar att självständigt ta kundkontakt och jobba aktivt med att identifiera kundernas behov samt ta fram förslag på lösningar på eget initiativ. Du gillar även att lära dig nya saker och att föra över kunskap till kollegor och kunder. Du är trygg och prestigelös som person och är inte rädd för att göra fel. Du är duktig på att jobba både självständigt och i grupp.
 



 För att lyckas bra i rollen kommer du att sätta upp mål och vägleda dig och andra på eget initiativ samt säkerställa godtagbara resultat och delegera arbete när det nödvändigt.
 



  
 


**OM TJÄNSTEN** 

 Omfattning: 
 
 Heltid eller deltid.
 




 Lön: 
 
 Grundlön + rörlig bonus/vinstdelning.
 




 Tillträde: 
 
 Vi rekryterar löpande.
 




  




**FÖRMÅNER** 

 Semester: 
 
 5 veckor
 




 Delägarskap: 
 
 Kan erbjudas efter 12 månader.
 




 Du får även 
 
 6% av din bruttolön
 
  att fördela på 
 
 förmånerna
 
 :
 



 - Avsättning till tjänstepension.
 



 - Friskvård (maxbelopp 5000kr/arbetsår).
 



 - Ljudbokstjänster, böcker, magasin.
 



 - Extra kompetensutveckling/utbildning.
 



 - Sjukvårdsförsäkring.
 



  




**KARRIÄRBESLUT?** 
* För oss är det viktigt att du fattar rätt beslut så att vår relation blir långsiktig. Därför finns vi här för att svara på frågor utifrån dina intressen och behov gällande den här möjligheten.

title: Teknikinformatör med intresse för ny teknologi
description:
Söker du efter en ny utmaning och vill skapa moderna informationslösningar med användaren i fokus? Hos oss på Aleido får du möjlighet att ta nästa steg inom teknikinformation tillsammans med våra kunder på deras digitaliseringsresa.
   

  

 Gå med i vårt team och hjälp oss att forma framtiden genom att utforska nya metoder och de senaste AI-innovationerna för att överbrygga klyftan mellan teknik och människorna som använder den. Om du har en passion för teknologi och en oändlig nyfikenhet att ständigt lära dig mer, är Aleido platsen för dig.
   

  

**Vad rollen innebär**
 I rollen som teknikinformatör kommer du bland annat:
   

  

* Samla in, analysera, strukturera och producera teknisk information för våra kunders produkter.
* Driva dokumentations- och kundprojekt tillsammans med Aleidos team och säkerställa leveranser av konsekvent, uppdaterad och tillgänglig dokumentation.
* Kartlägga och analysera våra kunders produkter och behov, och utifrån det utveckla deras nuvarande informationsstruktur.
* Hjälpa våra kunder med att förbereda inför deras digitaliseringsresa, samt proaktivt bidra med förbättringsförslag så att kunden får ut så mycket som möjligt av olika informationslösningar.


**Vem du är**
 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* Har ett par års erfarenhet som teknikinformatör.
* Har vana av att använda XML-baserade verktyg.
* Har erfarenhet av topic-baserat skrivande.
* Mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


 Meriterande:
   

  

* Erfarenhet från kognitionsvetenskap, UX och/eller teknisk bakgrund inom hård- eller mjukvara.


 Du som person har en utmärkt känsla för struktur samt gillar att se till de små detaljerna som tillsammans gör stor skillnad för slutprodukten. Du har lätt för att identifiera lösningar och har en utvecklad förmåga att förenkla komplex information. Vi tror vidare att du trivs mycket bra i rollen som konsult och ser det som en naturlig del att få vara med att bidra till att vidareutveckla vårt erbjudande i pågående kunduppdrag. Vi hoppas även att ditt intresse för teknik gör att du håller dig ajour med de nya teknologier inom branschen, som exempelvis AI. Slutligen räds du inte nya utmaningar och trivs i en roll med flera kontaktytor där du får vara drivande i ditt eget arbete.
   

  

**Varför Aleido?**
* Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du arbeta med de senaste AI- och teknologitrenderna, i en kultur som värderar ständig utveckling och lärande.
* Flexibelt arbete: Vi har en progressiv distansarbetsmodell som ger dig friheten att balansera arbetslivet på ett sätt som passar dig.
* Utveckling i fokus: Vi erbjuder en lärandekultur där du ständigt utmanas och har möjlighet att växa. Vårt löfte om lärande innebär att vi delar kunskap generöst och värdesätter din strävan att växa.
* Hållbar framtid: Vår vision är att skapa tekniska lösningar som är både innovativa och hållbara.


**Vilka vi är**
 Aleido är ett internationellt företag med lång tradition av att driva utvecklingen av eftermarknadsinformation och utbildningslösningar. Våra kunder utvecklar komplexa produkter eller system, eller söker kunskap och beredskap för att skapa varaktig förändring, inom en mängd branscher såsom fordon, telekom, industri, järnväg och medicinteknik. Vi är närmare tusen kollegor i fem länder. Tillsammans överbryggar vi klyftan mellan teknik och människorna som är beroende av den – genom att göra det avancerade lätt att förstå.

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
*We are looking for a skilled and experienced Senior Frontend Engineer with expertise in modern micro-frontend architecture to join our dynamic development team. Your primary focus will be to collaborate with the product team towards efficient workflows, great quality code and contribute to best practices for our community of Frontend developers.* 




  





**About our team** 




 We are a cross functional team consisting of frontend engineers, backend engineers, UX, and product. We believe that curiosity helps us build deeper connections to our team members as well as to our products and the problems we are trying to solve. We are also strong believers in collaboration, taking an interest, and asking questions. If you value teamwork, open communication, and curiosity we’d love to get to know you better!
 



  





 What you will do:
 


* Architecture Design: Design and develop the frontend architecture for large-scale web applications, considering scalability, performance, and maintainability. Define architectural patterns, frameworks, and libraries to be used in the development process.
* Frontend Development: Hands-on development of frontend code using modern web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, micro-frontends, and frameworks such as React, or Vue.js. Write clean, modular, and well-documented code that adheres to industry best practices and coding standards.
* Performance Optimization: Identify and address performance bottlenecks and optimize frontend code for improved speed and responsiveness.
* Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate effectively with designers, backend developers, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements, provide technical insights, and ensure smooth integration of frontend and backend components.
* Testing and Quality Assurance: Implement and promote frontend testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing. Ensure high code quality through code reviews, automated testing, and continuous integration practices.
* Deployment and release: Collaborate with DevOps and backend teams to ensure smooth deployment and release of frontend applications. Participate in the design and implementation of CI/CD pipelines to automate build, testing, and deployment processes.
* Research and Innovation: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in frontend technologies, frameworks, and tools. Evaluate and recommend new tools or methodologies that can improve frontend development processes and overall system performance.



  





**Who you are** 




 The ideal candidate is passionate about frontend development, has strong skills in JavaScript frameworks, can take ownership and drive projects & features to deliver the best experience to our customers.
 



  





 Key ingredients to succeed in this role:
 


* Extensive experience in frontend development, with proven experience in designing scalable and maintainable frontend architecture
* In-depth knowledge of frontend technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks such as React, NextJS, Typescript
* Familiarity with popular React libraries and frameworks such as Tanstack, Tailwind, CSS Storybook, React Hook Form.
* Familiarity with backend technologies and the ability to collaborate effectively with backend engineers. Experience with Node.js is preferable.
* Experience with frontend build tools, package managers, and version control systems (e.g. npm, Git).
* Strong leadership and communication skills, with the ability to influence and inspire a team.
* Understanding of API integration best practices via REST/GraphQL, including handling authentication, pagination, and error handling.
* Familiarity with design systems and UI component libraries.



  





**What we offer** 




 We believe in a healthy work-life balance meaning we encourage a hybrid set-up that puts emphasis on flexibility and autonomy. Your unique talents and skills are important to us, therefore we want you to thrive in your development and have the chance to grow within the organization in a way that resonates with your aspirations.
