title: Sr. Software Engineer | Stockholm
description:
*(Swedish version below)*  

  

Are you a talented Sr. Software Engineer with a passion for building scalable solutions that make a real difference? At Apotea, Sweden’s leading online pharmacy, you’ll be part of an innovative and fast-growing team that’s reshaping the future of e-commerce and digital healthcare.

**What You’ll Do**  

As a Sr. Software Engineer with .NET expertise, you’ll play a central role in developing and maintaining our internal systems and applications. You’ll collaborate closely with our developers, designers, and product owners to create new features, improve technical solutions, and ensure scalability and efficiency. You’ll be involved in every step of the development cycle—from concept and implementation to maintenance and optimization.


You will also develop architecture designs and scale yourself by mentoring and sharing your knowledge to other software engineers.

**Who You Are**

  

* Experience in building CI/CD pipelines
* Experience in architecture design
* Experience in .NET and C#.
* Experience with databases like SQL Server
* Passion and proved experience in guiding other software engineers
* Understanding of object-oriented programming and design patterns
* A problem-solving mindset
* Ability to work both independently and in a team
* A passion for learning

**Bonus Points If You Have:**

* Experience with frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* Previous experience in e-commerce or logistics systems.
* Knowledge of cloud services like Azure or AWS.

**What Apotea Offer You**

* Build software for advanced warehouse robotics
* Join a flat, agile organization with minimal bureaucracy
* Drive sustainability through eco-friendly packaging and logistics
* Grow your career with training and conferences
* Collaborate in a cross-functional, transparent environment
* Own projects from concept to deployment
* Experience meaningful impact on healthcare accessibility
* Thrive in a stable, future-focused company

**About Apotea**  

Apotea.se is Sweden’s largest online pharmacy, with the country’s broadest range of over 31,000 non-prescription items and nearly 18,000 prescription drugs for humans and animals. Recognized as Sweden’s most sustainable e-commerce company (Sustainable Brand Index 2021), we simplify everyday life for our customers with fast deliveries and expert advice. In 2023, Apotea reached a turnover of SEK 5.5 billion and currently employs about 1,000 people across Stockholm, Lidingö, and Morgongåva.  

  

**Join Us and Make a Difference!**



* Apply


* Intervietw 1: Culture fit


* Interview 2: Technical skills


* Background check: As a pharmacy, we always conduct a background check.


* Potential job offer



Does this sound exciting? **Apply today!** Interviews are ongoing, and the position may be filled quickly.  

  

*Welcome to Apotea – where technology meets health and creates magic!*

  

Är du en .NET-utvecklare som älskar att skapa skalbara lösningar som gör skillnad på riktigt? På Apotea, Sveriges ledande nätapotek, blir du en del av ett innovativt och snabbväxande team som formar framtidens e-handel och digital hälsa.

**Om Arbetsuppgifterna**  

Som programmerare med .NET-kunskap har du en nyckelroll i att utveckla och underhålla våra interna system och applikationer. Du samarbetar nära våra utvecklare, designers och produktägare för att skapa nya funktioner, förbättra tekniska lösningar och säkerställa skalbarhet och effektivitet. Du deltar i hela utvecklingscykeln – från idé och implementation till underhåll och optimering.

**För Att Trivas I Rollen Tror Vi Att**

  

* Erfarenhet av .NET-utveckling och C#
* Erfarenhet av databaser som SQL Server
* God förståelse för objektorienterad programmering och designmönster
* En lösningsorienterad inställning
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team
* Ett genuint intresse för att hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknikerna och trenderna

**Meriterande Om Du Har:**

* Erfarenhet av frontend-teknologier som HTML, CSS och JavaScript.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av e-handel eller logistiksystem.
* Kunskap om molntjänster som Azure eller AWS.

**Vad Apotea Erbjuder Dig**

  

* Bygg mjukvara för avancerad lagerrobotik
* Gå med i en platt, agil organisation med minimal byråkrati
* Driv hållbarhet genom att utveckla hållbara logistiklösningar
* Utveckla din karriär med utbildning och konferenser
* Äg projekt från idé till lansering
* Ha en meningsfull påverkan på tillgången till läkemedel

**Om Apotea**  

Apotea.se är Sveriges största nätapotek med över 31 000 receptfria varor och nästan 18 000 receptbelagda läkemedel. Utsedd till Sveriges mest hållbara e-handel (Sustainable Brand Index 2021), gör vi vardagen enklare för våra kunder med snabba leveranser och professionell rådgivning. Under 2023 omsatte Apotea 5,5 miljarder kronor och har cirka 1 000 anställda i Stockholm, Lidingö och Morgongåva.

**Bli en del av oss och gör skillnad!**



* Ansök


* Intervju 1: Kulturpassning


* Intervju 2: Teknisk förmåga


* Bakgrundskontroll: Som apotek genomför vi alltid en bakgrundskontroll.


* Eventuellt erbjudande om anställning



Låter det spännande? **Skicka in din ansökan redan idag**! Intervjuer sker löpande, och tjänsten kan tillsättas snabbt.

*Välkommen till Apotea – där teknik möter hälsa och skapar magi!*

title: Data Engineer
description:
*W**e are Tibber, the energy company that wants you to use less energy. Whaaat? That’s right. We’ll get back to that. Yes, we are by definition an energy company, but we’re more techy than most. How and why you might ask. Well, a third of our employees are actually working on developing products and solutions that can help you use energy in a smarter way and at a lower cost – all with the help of cool fancy tech. Good for our customers, their wallets, and the planet.*

 *Our growth rate has been truly amazing, and still, we’re just getting started. With millions of smart devices connected to the Tibber platform (like electric vehicles and smart thermostats), we have one of the most unique portfolios trading energy on the market*.

**Job Mission**
===============

In the Data team at Tibber you’ll be a vital part of Tibber’s mission to empower the clever by using data and technology to make it easier for our customers to make smarter energy choices. The Data team is a group of data engineers, analytics engineers, data analysts, data scientists, and quantitative engineers working together to break new ground in how to efficiently process, analyze and deliver data in a way that creates new insights and enables better decision-making for our customers.


As a **Data Engineer** you’ll be building the foundation of our data capabilities, helping to continue to push the boundaries of how to more efficiently process the vast amounts of data that power our data-driven solutions.

**What you'll do**
==================

**Build and maintain** scalable, robust, and efficient data pipelines in a modern cloud environment, ensuring our platform reliably supports growing data demands.

**Design and develop** data ingestion and processing frameworks that streamline the flow of information, delivering timely and accurate data to power insights.

**Own and evolve** the infrastructure behind our data platform, leveraging emerging technologies to bolster stability, performance, and cost-effectiveness.

**Collaborate closely** with cross-functional data teams to clarify needs and craft data-driven solutions, elevating user experiences and unlocking new possibilities.

**Stay curious** about the latest industry trends, offering ideas to refine architecture, scalability, and governance across diverse data use cases.

**Iterate and refine** workflows based on stakeholder feedback, team insights, and the evolving requirements of a dynamic energy market.

**What we're looking for**
==========================

**Data Pipeline Expertise.** A track record of 3+ years building ingestion and transformation frameworks that can handle large, fast-growing datasets with ease.

**Data Modeling & Storage.** Strong foundations in crafting efficient data structures, database designs, and storage solutions that optimize performance and reliability.

**Technical Mastery.** You’re highly proficient with Python and SQL, and have hands-on experience with Databricks, dbt, ThoughtSpot. At least some working knowledge of Spark and AWS would also be beneficial

**DevOps Know-How.** Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code (IaC), CI/CD pipelines, and version control (Git) to ensure smooth, automated deployments and maintenance.

**Security & Compliance.** Solid understanding of data privacy regulations and best practices, helping us maintain trust and integrity across diverse data systems.

**Passion for Scalable Solutions.** You love data. You love engineering. You think it’s the best combination on earth and you’re driven to create clean, efficient pipelines that empower data consumers and stand the test of time.

**The Tibber Mindset ‍️‍️**
===========================


Being on a mission to change an industry as we do fundamentally also means being prepared for the unexpected. Tibber is a startup in the word's true sense, which means we are on a journey of constant change. We do what others say can’t be done, try and fail together but never lose sight of our users.


We work passionately with sustainability and a circular approach, both with our own products and in the entire ecosystem that is affected by everything we do.


We're very proud of being a mission-driven startup with thousands and thousands of new users every month. Starting out with two passionate founders in 2016, we're now 300+ people working for Tibber in our offices in Stockholm, Førde, Berlin, Amsterdam, Oslo, and Helsinki, and with that number growing each week, we’re still just getting started. We will continue to grow within our markets, and we are thrilled to be backed by investors like Balderton Capital, Eight Roads Ventures, Founders Fund, Summa, and Schibsted.

*At Tibber, we are committed to hiring, developing, and retaining exceptional people regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, neurodiversity, or gender identity. We strongly encourage people from underrepresented groups to apply.*

title: Software engineer with cloud experience
description:
Customer behavior has changed. Today the customer journey starts online in search, maps and social media platforms. People are more likely to look up and interact with businesses and organizations using Google, Apple, Facebook, Instagram, etc, rather than using a company website. More than ever, providing correct information and interacting with customers wherever they are is a must for companies to build trust and engagement.


PinMeTo helps large multi-location companies manage their business information across hundreds of online services, by developing and offering a SaaS platform that puts businesses in control of their location data and lets them manage online interactions with their customers. Our SaaS offering consists of a platform of web applications developed internally by our Product department at our headquarter office in Malmö, Sweden.

**The Platform team** is responsible for managing and improving our cloud infrastructure and shared services hosted on AWS, with the goal of enabling our product teams to focus on delivering value to our customers. We are now looking to strengthen the team with one or more software engineers to work on a wide spectrum of technical challenges and opportunities, from managing AWS cloud services, CI/CD pipelines, and database clusters, to full stack application development, and everything in between.

**What makes this position interesting?**
-----------------------------------------


Join a **great work environment** built on people and collaboration - we work together from the office in small teams, with a strong work/life balance and lots of opportunity to learn from a diverse group of colleagues and a culture where helping each other succeed is highly valued.


You will be part of a small team of highly skilled engineers who prioritize working together over handing out tasks. This collaborative approach gives everyone on the team the chance to both learn from each other and influence the team. You will have ample opportunity to shape both the team and the work you do, letting you **maximize your impact and long term growth.**


The team has a wide area of responsibilities, from infrastructure and compliance to developer experience and operations, all the way to owning and developing shared applications for user authentication and authorization. You will get to work with all of this and have the opportunity to grow yourself by **continuously learning new things** in your role.

**What to expect when joining PinMeTo?**
----------------------------------------

**7 days:** Your first week will be focused on getting to know your team and our system, setting up your development environment, and pushing your first (small) change to production. Your onboarding buddy and your team will be supporting you from day 1, making sure that you get started as smoothly as possible.

**30 days:** Continuing in your first month you will focus on learning about our codebase, products, and infrastructure while participating in whatever initiative the team is working on, pair working as much as possible with your teammates to contribute to what is being delivered. During this time we also encourage you to spend time learning the parts of our tech stack that you might not have previous experience with.

**90 days:** A quarter in you should be able to apply your previous experience to the specific context of your team and what you are working on together, thereby increasing your impact by contributing to everything from technical decisions to how the team works. You will also be able to take ownership of driving larger tasks to completion.

**365 days:** By this time your contribution to the team is indistinguishable from that of the other software engineers that you work together with. You will have been able to leverage your strengths and experience to become proficient with work that you are used to, and together with the team you will have learned the things that were new to you at the beginning.

**Is this the role for you?**
-----------------------------


Do you recognize yourself below? Then we would love to hear from you!

* Have 2-5 years experience of developing and managing web applications in a cloud environment.
* Enjoy working with both backend and frontend code, with a strong passion for DevOps and system management.
* Solid knowledge of Javascript, Node.js, AWS, MongoDB, and related web development technologies.
* Have proven experience learning new technologies, with an adaptable and pragmatic approach to which ones to use. We use Elm for frontend development and assume this will be something new for you to learn. Don’t worry, it was the same for everyone else starting here.
* Prefer pair programming and collaborating with your team at the office, over focusing on your task alone at home.
* Are comfortable communicating in English and looking forward to joining a culturally diverse company (in Product alone we are 13 nationalities).

**Practicalities**
------------------


This is a full time role based in Malmö, Sweden. We have an office first working environment, so we assume you are located around the Malmö area.

**To promote a healthy work/life balance and professional development, we have:**

* Flexible working hours.
* One paid hour per week to use for exercise and workout, perfectly paired with a generous wellness allowance.
* A learning environment where we have regular hackdays, book circles, knowledge sharing forums, workshops, and other opportunities to grow and develop your skills.

**Interested? Next steps**
--------------------------


We’re excited to hear about your interest in this role, and look forward to hearing from you! As we have multiple positions available we encourage you to apply sooner rather than later. We go through applications continuously as they come in and are looking to fill these positions as soon as we find the right candidates.

**The process in short**


1️⃣ If we think you can be a match for what we are looking for we will first set up an introductory online meeting to get to know each other better.  

2️⃣ If there is mutual interest you will complete an assessment using our partner Alva Labs.  

3️⃣ The process then consists of two interviews, one for evaluating if we would be a good match for each other and the other a technical interview to assess competence. Both at our office.  

4️⃣ That’s it! After this, if we believe we are a great match for each other we will discuss an agreement with you.


Throughout this process your main contact person will be Anna van Duijvenbode, Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist (anna.v.duijvenbode@pinmeto.com). If you have any questions about the role or process please feel free to get in touch with us.

### **We look forward to welcoming you to PinMeTo!**

*PinMeTo was founded in 2013, when location data of most companies was outdated, inconsistent or simply missing on services like Google, Facebook and Apple. The vision was to provide a solution that enables brands with multiple locations to connect with their customers, outperform their competitors and thrive. Since then we have grown to 100+ employees located in 8 countries, helping 1,000+ companies manage 125,000+ locations worldwide. Trusted by enterprise companies like H&M, 7-Eleven, and Hertz, PinMeTo stands as a leading player within the local search and marketing technology industry.*

title: Software Engineer | Stockholm
description:
*(Swedish version below)*  

  

Are you a talented Software Engineer with a passion for building scalable solutions that make a real difference? At Apotea, Sweden’s leading online pharmacy, you’ll be part of an innovative and fast-growing team that’s reshaping the future of e-commerce and digital healthcare.

**What You’ll Do**  

As a Software Engineer with .NET expertise, you’ll play a central role in developing and maintaining our internal systems and applications. You’ll collaborate closely with our developers, designers, and product owners to create new features, improve technical solutions, and ensure scalability and efficiency. You’ll be involved in every step of the development cycle—from concept and implementation to maintenance and optimization.

**Who You Are**

  

* Experience in .NET and C#.
* Experience with databases like SQL Server
* Understanding of object-oriented programming and design patterns
* A problem-solving mindset
* Ability to work both independently and in a team
* A passion for learning

**Bonus Points If You Have:**

* Experience with frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
* Previous experience in e-commerce or logistics systems.
* Knowledge of cloud services like Azure or AWS.

**What Apotea Offer You**

* Build software for advanced warehouse robotics
* Join a flat, agile organization with minimal bureaucracy
* Drive sustainability through eco-friendly packaging and logistics
* Grow your career with training and conferences
* Collaborate in a cross-functional, transparent environment
* Own projects from concept to deployment
* Experience meaningful impact on healthcare accessibility
* Thrive in a stable, future-focused company

**About Apotea**  

Apotea.se is Sweden’s largest online pharmacy, with the country’s broadest range of over 31,000 non-prescription items and nearly 18,000 prescription drugs for humans and animals. Recognized as Sweden’s most sustainable e-commerce company (Sustainable Brand Index 2021), we simplify everyday life for our customers with fast deliveries and expert advice. In 2023, Apotea reached a turnover of SEK 5.5 billion and currently employs about 1,000 people across Stockholm, Lidingö, and Morgongåva.  

  

**Join Us and Make a Difference!**



* Apply


* Intervietw 1: Culture fit


* Interview 2: Technical skills


* Background check: As a pharmacy, we always conduct a background check.


* Potential job offer



Does this sound exciting? **Apply today!** Interviews are ongoing, and the position may be filled quickly.  

  

*Welcome to Apotea – where technology meets health and creates magic!*

  

Är du en .NET-utvecklare som älskar att skapa skalbara lösningar som gör skillnad på riktigt? På Apotea, Sveriges ledande nätapotek, blir du en del av ett innovativt och snabbväxande team som formar framtidens e-handel och digital hälsa.

**Om Arbetsuppgifterna**  

Som programmerare med .NET-kunskap har du en nyckelroll i att utveckla och underhålla våra interna system och applikationer. Du samarbetar nära våra utvecklare, designers och produktägare för att skapa nya funktioner, förbättra tekniska lösningar och säkerställa skalbarhet och effektivitet. Du deltar i hela utvecklingscykeln – från idé och implementation till underhåll och optimering.

**För Att Trivas I Rollen Tror Vi Att**

  

* Erfarenhet av .NET-utveckling och C#
* Erfarenhet av databaser som SQL Server
* God förståelse för objektorienterad programmering och designmönster
* En lösningsorienterad inställning
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team
* Ett genuint intresse för att hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknikerna och trenderna

**Meriterande Om Du Har:**

* Erfarenhet av frontend-teknologier som HTML, CSS och JavaScript.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av e-handel eller logistiksystem.
* Kunskap om molntjänster som Azure eller AWS.

**Vad Apotea Erbjuder Dig**

  

* Bygg mjukvara för avancerad lagerrobotik
* Gå med i en platt, agil organisation med minimal byråkrati
* Driv hållbarhet genom att utveckla hållbara logistiklösningar
* Utveckla din karriär med utbildning och konferenser
* Äg projekt från idé till lansering
* Ha en meningsfull påverkan på tillgången till läkemedel

**Om Apotea**  

Apotea.se är Sveriges största nätapotek med över 31 000 receptfria varor och nästan 18 000 receptbelagda läkemedel. Utsedd till Sveriges mest hållbara e-handel (Sustainable Brand Index 2021), gör vi vardagen enklare för våra kunder med snabba leveranser och professionell rådgivning. Under 2023 omsatte Apotea 5,5 miljarder kronor och har cirka 1 000 anställda i Stockholm, Lidingö och Morgongåva.

**Bli en del av oss och gör skillnad!**



* Ansök


* Intervju 1: Kulturpassning


* Intervju 2: Teknisk förmåga


* Bakgrundskontroll: Som apotek genomför vi alltid en bakgrundskontroll.


* Eventuellt erbjudande om anställning



Låter det spännande? **Skicka in din ansökan redan idag**! Intervjuer sker löpande, och tjänsten kan tillsättas snabbt.

*Välkommen till Apotea – där teknik möter hälsa och skapar magi!*

title: IT Analyst, Global IT Support
description:
Hydro Global Business Services (GBS) is an organizational area that operates as an internal service provider for the Hydro group. Its ultimate purpose is to deliver relevant IT, financial and HR business services to all business areas within the company.

 **Role purpose**

  

The IT Analyst is mainly responsible for the overall health & smooth running of IT infrastructure at Hydro location(s) with the purpose to ensure business users gain maximum benefits from those systems.

 **Responsibilities**

  

* Installing and configuring Cisco switches
* Installing servers and computers
* Taking active part in incident resolution and troubleshooting
* Working with global support teams to resolve both IT infrastructure and application relatedissues
* Installing or participating in installation of IT infrastructure components, applications, and any other relevant tools used at the location(s)
* Monitoring and maintaining location specific infrastructure and applications following standard operating procedures
* Take active part in location-specific and global IT projects
* Maintaining user accounts within the locally supported applications.
* Acting as location representative of GBS IT professionals
* Taking part in IT change management flows
* Troubleshooting IT infrastructure incidents and application errors, diagnosing and solving hardware/software faults
* Follow global architecture-, security-, and operational standards and policies
* Maintaining location specific IT documentations within your area of responsibility

 **Requirements**

  

* Experience of Cisco switches
* 5 years experience of Windows client and servers.
* Experience working in ServiceNow
* IT Technician qualification is a must; IT Engineer or equivalent is preferred
* Swedish fluently
* English fluently
* Conflict handling
* Customer service orientation

 **Hydro offers**

  

* Working at the world’s only fully integrated aluminum and leading renewable energy company
* Diverse, global teams
* Flexible work environment/home office
* We provide you the freedom to be creative and to learn from experts
* Possibility to grow with the company, gain new certificates
* Attractive benefit package

  

Applications from severely disabled and equally disabled people will be considered with equal suitability.  

Please apply online in ONE with your CV and optionally a cover letter.


If you have any questions, please contact:

  

Anita Baloni-Kovács  

Anita.Ghh.Kovacs@hydro.com

title: Software Engineer - Cloud, DevOps & Constraint Development
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**

  

Are you passionate about solving complex challenges with cutting-edge technologies? We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our dynamic Solution Configuration team. In this role, you will be part of our digital transformation journey, contributing to the development of cloud solutions, constraint programming, and DevOps workflows. You will play a key role in designing, modelling, and documenting complex logic and data structures, ensuring high-quality, scalable, and innovative solutions.

 **What you will do:**

* Develop and optimize solutions in cloud development, DevOps, and constraint programming.
* Contribute to the evolution of our technology stack and solution configuration capabilities.
* Build and enhance configuration support using constraint and algorithmic programming.
* Model and document complex logic and data structures to support business-critical applications.
* Ensure high code quality, reliability, and maintainability in mission-critical systems.
* Introduce innovative technologies and evaluate new approaches for future development.
* Collaborate with a team of highly skilled engineers and cross-functional stakeholders.

 **The skills you bring:**

* Education: Bachelor's or master’s degree in computer science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
* Cloud Development Expertise – Hands-on experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, including cloud-native design, development, and deployment.
* Containerization & Orchestration – Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and best practices for cloud-based scalability.
* DevOps & CI/CD – Experience with automated pipelines, infrastructure as code (IaC), and cloud-based development environments.
* Programming & Scripting – Proficiency in Python, Java, TypeScript, or Go, plus scripting knowledge (Bash, PowerShell) for automation.
* Problem-Solving & Collaboration – Strong analytical skills, ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Adaptability & Willingness to Learn – Open to tackling new challenges and continuously improving skill sets.
* Fluent in English, both written and spoken.

title: Information Security Officer
description:
**About Avida:** 




 At Avida, we specialize in consumer and SME financing, delivering exceptional customer experiences both digitally and personally. We are currently on an exciting transformation journey. As of January 1, 2025, we proudly completed the acquisition of Santander Consumer Bank's credit card operations in Sweden and Norway, as well as their retail financing business with Elkjøp (Norway) and Elgiganten (Sweden). This milestone brought 450,000 new private customers and nearly 50 new employees into our growing organization.
 



 With our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Oslo, Helsinki, and Stavanger,
 
 Avida now has a team of approximately 210 employees. We are regulated by the
 
 Swedish Financial Supervisory Authority (Finansinspektionen) and are committed to shaping the future of finance.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




  





 Information Security Officer (ISO) works closely with CISO and IT management to maintain and improve Avidas IT security architecture, controls and processes. ISO contributes to regulatory compliance and control of cyber risks.
 



  





 ISO reports to CIO and is part of the IT management team.
 



  





 The main tasks are stated in the job description, but the employee may be required to perform other tasks than those stated in the job description.
 



  





**Tasks** 




  




* Together with CISO and IT management maintain and improve Avidas IT security architecture, controls and processes
* Manage Avidas ISMS based on ISO 27001
* Assist CIO in maintaining IT policies and security instructions
* On a quarterly basis create status reports for the ARC meetings
* Assist CISO in awareness trainings for the entire company
* In cooperation with CISO and IT management contribute to regulatory compliance (e.g. EBA Guidelines, FI FFFS, GDPR, DORA) within ICT
* Maintain and drive a documented process that ensures regular tests of Disaster Recovery (DR) routines
* Maintain and drive a documented process that ensures regular user access reviews within and outside IT
* Maintain and drive a documented process that ensures regular penetration tests (PEN)
* Participate, facilitate and follow-up on actions from internal, external and cyber security related audits
* In cooperation with CTO, ensure regular tests of the “Riksgälden”-file
* Manage and visualize IT annual wheel which should include regular audits, tests and trainings



  





**Competence** 




  




* Minimum of 3 years relevant working experience with Cyber and Information security
* Working experience with operational risks, cyber and information security within the financial sector
* Knowledge of regulatory frameworks such as EBA Guidelines, FI FFFS, GDPR and/or DORA
* Working experience with Cyber and Information Security in Cloud environments
* Working proficiency in English and Swedish (written and oral skills) and experience from presenting summary reports to company management



  





**Characteristics** 




  




* Problem solver
* Structured
* Team player
* Integrity








  





**Why Avida?** 




 At Avida, you’ll be part of a team that values innovation, collaboration, and personal growth. We’re on a mission to transform the financial landscape and are looking for talented individuals to help us get there. With a supportive work culture and exciting challenges, this is your chance to make a real impact.
 



  





**Application Process:** 




 This recruitment is managed by
 **UNQ Recruitment** 
 , and we kindly ask recruitment and consulting firms not to contact us directly. All applications and initial interviews will be conducted by them.
 



 If you have any questions about the role, please contact
 **Nina Sejdini** 
 via email at
 **nina@unqgroup.se.**

title: Customer Success Manager - Nordics
description:
**Storyblok is the enterprise-ready headless CMS that empowers developers and marketers to bring ideas to market faster.** 
 It supports the entire content lifecycle—from creation and management to delivery—streamlining workflows, boosting productivity, and ensuring exceptional performance and accessibility. Storyblok frees you from the pain of legacy CMS platforms and empowers your teams to ship content quickly and build with complete flexibility.
   

  

**Designed for global scalability and secure collaboration,** 
 Storyblok enables teams to deliver seamless, engaging digital experiences at scale. Trusted by leading brands like Oatly, Virgin Media O2, Deliveroo, Renault, and Education First, Storyblok helps businesses of all sizes unlock new opportunities, channels, and markets—delivering a bigger, faster market impact.
   

  

**WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU**
 You will be joining a growing company where you can contribute to many "firsts". Plus these benefits:
   

  

* Monthly remote work stipend (home internet costs, electricity). Home office equipment package right at the start (laptop, keyboard, monitor…)
* Home office equipment upgrade (furniture, ear plugs …) or membership to a local co-working space after your onboarding
* Sick leave benefit, parental leave and 25 days of annual leave plus your local national holidays
* Personal development fund for courses, books, conferences, and material
* VSOP (Virtual Stock Option Plan)
* The annual international team-building trip, quarterly and monthly online get-togethers
* As a fully remote company, with work-life balance at its core, you'll enjoy flexible schedules
* An international team that loves to have fun at work and works hard together to accomplish shared goals


**JOB SUMMARY**
 The 'Customer Success Manager' will develop and maintain strong relationships with Storyblok customers, ensuring their business needs are met and exceeded. Working with Enterprise Customers, they will own all aspects of the post-sales process, with a key focus on closing large deals and collaborating with Storyblok's Sales team to identify new opportunities within the assigned sales territory.
   

  

**ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS**
* Build trusted relationships with customers and help them get the most out of the product this includes but is not limited to; onboarding, recurrent training, answering technical and content-based questions.
* Organize and run Quarterly Business Reviews (some onsite travel may be required)
* Attend Industry events
* Report up to date metrics on client usage data and health indicators.
* Retain and renew existing accounts.
* Develop long term strategic account plans that identify expansion opportunities. Own and close commercial upsell.
* Own the client and renewal opportunity data in Salesforce and ensure accuracy.
* Provide a first class customer experience', we care about our customers and their experience, and our CSMs to become trusted advisors.
* Work closely with internal teams. For example; provide feedback to the product teams, liaise with Marketing teams on PR and Case Studies.


**EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE**
* Experience working in a client-facing role, mainly account management or customer success experience, or other closely related work
* Experience managing account renewals - the ideal candidate should have a sales oriented approach and be able to effectively apply it throughout the entire customer journey
* A proven record driving customer satisfaction and enhancing the customer experience
* SaaS experience and working knowledge of software products
* Strong computer skills and proficiency in Google Workspace, Excel, and other word processing tools; prior knowledge of Salesforce or another CRM is preferred
* Ability to be self-motivated, highly organized, and have a positive attitude and professional demeanor
* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, analytical skills


**MENTAL, PHYSICAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL REQUIREMENTS**
 Remote (home) work opportunity or funded by Storyblok co-working space
   

  

**GENERAL TERMS**
*Storyblok has a commitment to diversity and inclusion. We strive to create a hiring environment in which all people feel they are equally respected and valued, irrespective of gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, ethnicity, age, religion, citizenship or any other characteristic.
 *You can find more information about our privacy policy* 

*here* 
*.**
 All communications regarding job opportunities at Storyblok will come from an official Storyblok employee with an email address ending in @storyblok.com. We will never redirect you to another portal or another site that is unrelated to our domain (storyblok.com).
   

  

*Here is a sneak peek of* 
*Storyblok's Visual Editor*
*If you need an accommodation for any part of the application process, please email talent.acquisition@storyblok.com*

title: (Associate) IT Project Manager (IT Base and Platforms) – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

 The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate (GCS), Group Digital Office (GDO), Data and Information Solutions Department (DIS), at its headquarters in Luxembourg, an
 **(Associate) IT Project Manager (IT Base and Platforms)\*** 
**.**
**This is a full time position at grade 4/5 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
*\*internal benchmark* 
*(Associate) Officer IT Applications*
*Panel interviews are foreseen as from March 2025*
 Purpose
   

  

 You will design, plan, coordinate, implement and report on IT Base and Platforms (IBP) Value Chain projects in line with business needs and the EIB Digital transformation Programme, with a view of promoting a digital workplace at the EIB and to achieve the agreed project/program results.
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 The IT Base and Platforms PMO reports directly to the Head of Department.
   

  

 This position works in liaison with the other team members in the department, particularly those involved in the IBP stream governance. In the incumbent also has extensive contacts with members of the Platforms & Services Department, representatives from Business Solutions Department and other divisions in GDO.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Take project management responsibilities for assigned IT projects (mainly, from the IT Base and Platforms (IBP) Value Stream), coordination, scheduling and implementation of new or enhanced software applications with business users and other IT technical teams to ensure the completion of project within set time, budget and quality objectives.
* Support the IBP Steering Committee in the implementation of the governance defined for the stream.
* Coordinate the preparation of IBP meetings and organise discussions between Value Chains technical leads and IBP leads to prepare the actions and decisions for the IBP Steering Committee.
* Guide the IBP Steering Committee in refining, prioritising and planning the requests in the backlog.
* Compile status reports from flagships and key transversal initiatives (e.g.: M365 programme, cloud journey)
* Monitor and report progress of KPIs defined for IT strategy pillars.
* Monitor and report the assignment of IBP budget envelope and its consumption.
* Maintain and track the pipeline of requests received across the demand management tool, following the guidance of Head of Divisions, Head of Units or other key members of IBP Stream.
* Organise and develop the capacity planning enabling prioritisation of requests within the stream.
* Help IBP Steering Committee members to detect critical services and associated pain points and risks and guide them to adopt new ways of working created by the new delivery model.
* Provide support on communication around the committee and its achievements, at programme level as well as to senior management and EIB Group staff.
* Work closely with DTO’s Project Management Office and provide input for improvement on the demand management, capacity, and project management tools.
* Participate in Bank-wide initiatives, representing own domain, or in Department-wide initiatives, representing own domain for GCS-GDO.


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in preferably in computer science or related discipline
* At least 3 years work experience in roles related to the Project Management / PMO / Portfolio Demand Management, preferably related to IT
* Good project management and stakeholder management skills
* Experience working in multicultural teams with various technical and functional backgrounds would be an advantage
* Excellent communication and organisation skills, with ability to influence stakeholders and partners
* Understanding of the banking activities and operational processes is considered as an advantage.
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*) with a good command of the other. (Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage).


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core competencies* 
 here
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

*(\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 We strongly invite applicants with a disability, neurodivergent profile or chronic condition to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

*This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.*

title: Systemförvaltare
company_industry: Real Estate and Equipment Rental Services and IT System Operations and Maintenance
description:
**Systemförvaltare till Einar Mattsson, en tidlös och innovativ aktör i hjärtat av Södermalm** 




 Är du en erfaren systemförvaltare med passion för att utveckla och effektivisera verksamhetssystem? Vill du spela en central roll i vår digitala utvecklingsresa inom en välrenommerad organisation – där omtanke, engagemang och framåtanda står i fokus? Då kan detta vara rätt tjänst för dig!
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som systemförvaltare på Einar Mattsson får du en central roll i att implementera och vidareutveckla vår systemförvaltningsmodell över koncernens alla system. Du ansvarar för att säkerställa systemens funktionalitet, kontinuerliga förbättring och anpassning efter verksamhetens behov.
 



  





 Du blir en del av teamet
 **IT-Systemstöd** 
 , där du tillsammans med engagerade kollegor arbetar med systemförvaltning, projektledning och strategiskt digitalt utvecklingsarbete. Denna roll kräver att du har en djup systemförståelse för att kunna analysera, dokumentera och optimera våra system.
 



  





 Våra system har varierande antal användare och spänner över flera verksamhetsområden. Bland de system vi använder finns ekonomisystemet Unit4, fastighetssystemen Vitec, FM Access samt budget- och prognosverktyget Insikt. Utöver dessa står vi inför implementeringen av nya system för ärendehantering mot våra kunder/boende. Observera att du inte behöver vara expert på dessa system, men du ska ha förmågan att sätta dig in i dem.
 



  





 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:
 



 ✔ Implementera, utveckla vår systemförvaltningsmodell.
 



 ✔ Förvalta och vidareutveckla verksamhetssystem primärt inom fastighetsförvaltning och ekonomi.
 



 ✔ Dokumentera integrationer, systemanpassningar och processer samt ta fram beslutsunderlag för förändringar.
 



 ✔ Driva och prioritera förvaltningsaktiviteter samt säkerställa att systemdokumentation är aktuell och korrekt.
 



 ✔ Ge stöd och utbildning till superusers och systemansvariga i verksamheten.
 



 ✔ Leda och delta i förbättringsprojekt kopplade till system och digitalisering.
 



  





**Din profil** 




 Vi söker dig som kan tillföra nya perspektiv och har en skarp förmåga att identifiera vad som behöver göras på systemnivå. Du ser helheten och hur allt hänger samman, samtidigt som du med lätthet kan dyka ner i detaljer när det krävs. I den här rollen får du röra dig sömlöst mellan strategiska beslut och praktiska lösningar – just den dynamiken gör rollen både utmanande och stimulerande. Vi står inför en spännande digital förändring, där din kompetens kommer att vara en nyckelresurs på vår resa framåt.
 



  





 För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du har:
 



 ✅ Erfarenhet av systemförvaltning och förståelse för systemadministration, integrationer och dokumentation.
 



 ✅ Förmåga att strukturera, prioritera och växla mellan helhetsperspektiv och detaljnivå.
 



 ✅ Stark kommunikativ förmåga – du samarbetar effektivt med både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter.
 



  





 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av systemförvaltning inom fastighetsbranschen eller liknande verksamhet. Även en högre utbildning inom IT, systemvetenskap eller motsvarande ses som en fördel.
 



  





**Varför Einar Mattsson?** 




 Vi erbjuder en arbetsplats där din expertis verkligen gör skillnad. Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka och utveckla både vår systemförvaltning och din egen karriär. Vi är en långsiktig, stabil aktör med en stark entreprenörskultur där vi värdesätter
 **omtanke, engagemang och framåtanda** 
 .
 



  





 Hos oss erbjuds kollektivavtal och friskvårdsbidrag samt en förmån inom hyresbostadsmarknaden i Stockholm.
 



  





 Detta är en hybridlösning som erbjuder flexibilitet, men eftersom din roll som systemförvaltare är central ser vi gärna att du kan vara på plats tillsammans med kollegor när det behövs för gott samarbete och viktiga möten.
 



  





 Du kommer att arbeta i våra nyrenoverade, ljusa lokaler i hjärtat av Södermalm och bli en del av ett team som tillsammans driver digital utveckling framåt.
 



  





**Om Einar Mattsson** 




 Einar Mattsson är ett av Stockholms mest välrenommerade och långsiktiga fastighetsbolag, med en historia som sträcker sig över 90 år. Vi kombinerar gedigen erfarenhet med innovation och nytänkande för att skapa hållbara bostäder och stadsmiljöer. Som en stabil och familjeägd koncern verkar vi genom hela värdekedjan – från fastighetsförvaltning och nyproduktion till projektutveckling och investeringar. Med en stark värdegrund och ett framtidsfokus fortsätter vi att utveckla Stockholm för kommande generationer.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Vi ser fram emot att få veta mer om dig! Urval och intervjuer sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
 **Observera att ett personlighetstest och ett logiktest ingår i rekryteringsprocessen.** 




  





 Vid frågor om roller vänligen kontakta rekryterare Agnes Hildén, på
 
 agnes.hilden@barona.se
 
 . I enlighet med GDPR tar vi inte emot ansökningar via email.
 



  





 📍
 **Plats:** 
 Rosenlundsgatan 58, Södermalm
 



 📅
 **Anställningsform:** 
 Tillsvidare och hybrid
 



 🔗
 **Läs mer om oss på:** 

 www.einarmattsson.se
 




  





 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: SAP Basis Administrator / Consultant
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, IT System Testing and Evaluation, and Information Services
description:
**SAP Basis Administrator / Consultant – Level L3** 




 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 



 Contract
 








**SAP Operation (BAU)** 



* Able to support large SAP Landscapes (100+ systems) including Dev/Quality/Productive environments in line with business requirements as SAP Basis Administrator – Support, Configure, Optimizing & Monitoring.
* Core experience of working with SAP ECC on Unix (AIX/SLES) and Oracle DB (up to rel. 19) & SAP HANA (rel. 2.x); SAP on Azure, SAP PI/PO, SAP BW, SAP-ISU, CRM, Solution Manager 7.2, etc. Good experience in database administration in Oracle & HANA DB.
* Must be able to handle system clone/copy and refresh activities independently
* SAP Basis Administration including SAP system logs, process monitoring, analysis and clean-up of update terminations, lock entries and ABAP dumps, etc.
* Monitor, analyse, and identify trends for system performance and resource utilization.
* Respond to system problems on a 24x7 basis and take part in on-call rotation.
* Plan and execute SAP system upgrades/SPS/Kernel upgrades periodically.
* Plan and perform Basis disaster recovery and HA testing.
* Collaborate across IT functions including OS team, networking and security teams to assist in driving out solutions for SAP
* Ability to implement changes to the SAP environment using change control processes and adherence to ITIL processes.
* Well versed with SAP automation using tools/scripts.
* Maintaining project documentations including design/architecture, configurations, test execution, SoP, etc.



  





**Project Execution:** 



* Must have experience on Cloud Migration to Hyperscalers (Azure/AWS), SAP EHP upgrade, Unicode conversion, HANA DB conversion/migration.
* Ability to work on oracle upgrade and migration.
* Must have HANA DB experience to upgrade, refresh, patch update, installation and troubleshooting.
* Experience in Installation and Configuration of HANA DB AND S4 HANA
* Should have experience on S4HANA conversion.
* Should have good experience on SAP sizing on both Azure and local data center.
* Must have experience on cloud migration specially in Microsoft Azure.
* Must have experience on high availability setup.
* High Availability (HA) setup on cloud Environments
* Migration of SAP ERP, SAP BW and SAP NetWeaver from oracle to SAP HANA, in place migration and on-premises to azure
* Migrated the cluster systems to the distributed environment
* Database export and import via SWPM.
* Single Sign-On with SAP HANA Database using Kerberos and Microsoft Active Directory
* Homogeneous Migration of SAP systems from one hardware to another for NW upgrades
* SLD migration
* Content server administration & upgrades.
* Build new SAP systems with database installation and system copy method.








**Qualification:** 



* Masters/Bachelor’s degree in IT/Computer Science or equivalent degree from a recognised university.
* 8 - 12 years of work experience in SAP Basis Administration SAP ECC & HANA environments, SAP on Azure,
* Desirable – SAP Certified Basis Administrator / HANA Admin. (Associate level), OS-DB migration, Azure
* Exposure to ITIL process and experience in working in large operational setup of 24/7 support.
* Fluently English speaking & writing

title: Chief Technology Officer
description:
**Wintrgarden is revolutionizing the recruitment industry, and we need a visionary CTO to join us on this exciting journey.** 




 As the CTO at Wintrgarden, you won’t just be overseeing our technology — you’ll be a key player in shaping the future of the company. You will have the opportunity to influence both our technical direction and our strategic growth, playing a vital role in our mission to transform how companies attract, engage, and retain talent.
 



 This is a unique chance to join a fast-growing company at a critical time, where your decisions will directly impact the trajectory of Wintrgarden. As part of the leadership team, you will have a 
 
 seat at the table
 
  and will help steer the ship as we scale and expand.
 



  





**What we’re looking for…** 



* A seasoned tech leader
 
  who thrives in dynamic, high-growth environments and is eager to play a pivotal role in shaping a company’s future.
* Expertise in scalable systems
 
 : From architecture to cloud platforms, you’ll oversee the evolution of our product, ensuring we continue to innovate and grow at speed.
* Leadership experience
 
 : You’ll lead a growing tech team, mentor engineers, and ensure the technical vision is aligned with our business goals.
* A strategic, hands-on problem solver
 
 : You’ll be involved in key technical decisions while also collaborating closely with our leadership team to scale the company and strengthen our market position.
* A true partner
 
 : We’re looking for someone who understands the importance of culture and can work alongside cross-functional teams to drive change and build something extraordinary.



  





  





**Who You Are** 



* You have built and launched multiple products from scratch end-to-end.
* You are an expert building either with Angular + Spring Boot with Java (stack of our current product), or React + Node.js (proposed new tech stack to rebuild the product from scratch).
* You are a hands-on coder and a true full-stack engineer.
* You are client-obsessed.
* You have high standards for product quality, design, and user experience.
* You ship and iterate fast.



  





**What you will do…** 



* Shape our future
 
 : As CTO, you will be instrumental in defining our technology vision and leading our engineering team in executing that vision.
* Collaborate with the executive team
 
 : Align technology decisions with broader business goals, helping us scale quickly while ensuring a seamless, world-class experience for our customers.
* Build and scale
 
 : You’ll ensure our platform continues to grow and innovate, empowering businesses to attract the best talent and making a lasting impact on the recruitment industry.
* Leadership & growth
 
 : Play a key role in hiring, mentoring, and scaling a top-tier tech team that will help propel us forward.



  





**What we offer you…** 



* A high-impact role
 
 : This is more than just a CTO position — it’s an opportunity to be an integral part of Wintrgarden’s journey. Your leadership will directly shape the direction of the company and its technology.
* Ownership in the company
 
 : We want you to be as invested in Wintrgarden’s success as we are. As part of your compensation, you will receive equity in the company — giving you a stake in our future and the rewards that come with it.
* A fast-growing, innovative company
 
 : Join us at a pivotal time when your contributions will have an outsized impact on both our tech and business growth.
* Collaborative culture
 
 : Work alongside a team of passionate and driven individuals who are committed to revolutionizing the recruitment space.
* Flexible work environment
 
 : We offer hybrid remote work with flexibility to ensure you can maintain a healthy work-life balance.
* Competitive compensation
 
 : Along with your equity, we offer a competitive salary and additional benefits designed to reward your expertise and contributions.



  






 The recruitment process…
 



1. Submit your application and tell us why you're the perfect fit for the role.
2. Intro call with our co-founder, where we’ll discuss your vision for the company and how you can help lead us forward.
3. A conversation with our leadership team to dive deeper into your experience and how you can play an instrumental role in shaping Wintrgarden’s future.
4. An offer to join us on this exciting journey, with the opportunity to build something great and share in the rewards of our success!



  





 If you’re ready to take on a 
 
 key leadership role
 
  and be part of something game-changing, we want to hear from you. Join us at Wintrgarden and let’s build the future of recruitment —
 **together** 
 .

title: Embedded Software Product Owner, Göteborg
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Embedded Software Product Owner, Göteborg 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Embedded Software Product Owner to join our dynamic agile product management team. In this role, you will own a part of the connectivity product, covering a set of solutions/functions developed by 1-2 scrum teams. You will work closely with stakeholders and other product owners to ensure the successful delivery of high-quality embedded software solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Product Ownership: Own and manage part of the connectivity product, ensuring alignment with the overall product vision and goals.
* Stakeholder Engagement: Identify needs from stakeholders, including project managers, epic-owners, release management, and end-to-end testing teams.
* Backlog Management: Prioritize features in the team's backlogs, refine backlog items, and ensure clear and concise user stories.
* Agile Collaboration: Participate in agile ceremonies such as daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospective sessions, sprint reviews, and backlog grooming sessions.
* Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other product owners in your product group and across other product groups to achieve shared visions and goals.
* Bug Tracking: Follow up on prioritized bugs, ensuring timely resolution and communication with relevant stakeholders.


**Requirements**
* Proven experience as a Product Owner in an agile environment, preferably within embedded software development.
* Strong understanding of embedded systems and connectivity solutions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage effectively with stakeholders at all levels.
* Proficiency in backlog management and agile tools (e.g., Jira, Trello).
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at kumud@vipas.se
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested, we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: IT-chef
company: Royal College of Music in Stockholm
description:
Kungl. Musikhögskolan i Stockholm (KMH) söker nu en erfaren och engagerad IT-chef som vill leda och utveckla IT-verksamheten i en kreativ och inspirerande miljö. Vi söker dig som har en kombination av teknisk erfarenhet och strategisk förmåga inom IT och är en engagerande ledare.
 



  





 Anställningen är tillsvidare på heltid. KMH tillämpar sex månaders provanställning.
 



  





**Arbetsplatsen** 




 KMH är Sveriges enda fristående högskola inom musikområdet. Vi utbildar studenter på högsta internationella nivå i olika musikgenrer, dirigering, komposition, musik- och medieproduktion samt inom olika lärarutbildningar med inriktning mot musik. KMH bedriver även forskning och forskarutbildning i musik och musikpedagogik, och deltar i omfattande konstnärliga och pedagogiska forsknings- och utvecklingsprojekt i Sverige och internationellt.
 



  





 KMH är en liten högskola där medarbetare och chefer har varierande uppdrag, ofta inom flera fält. Den lilla organisationen ger stort utrymme att påverka verksamheten samtidigt som du som chef behöver vara beredd att hantera både strategiska och operativa frågor. KMH är beläget på Valhallavägen vid Stadion samt vid Edsbergs slott i Sollentuna. IT-avdelningen har ca fem medarbetare vilka var och en har lång erfarenhet inom IT och sina specifika arbetsområden. Som IT-chef ingår du i högskoleförvaltningens grupp för avdelningschefer.
 



  
 



**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som IT-chef har du ett övergripande ansvar för att KMH:s IT-miljö fungerar, är säker och för att dess utveckling följer myndighetskrav och sker i enlighet med KMH:s strategi. Du leder IT-avdelningens arbete som omfattar områdena IT, telefoni och fysisk säkerhet.
 



  





 Arbetet innebär bland annat genomförande av upphandlingar och upprättande av avtal samt administrativt myndighetsarbete såsom bl a remissbesvarande. Arbetet innebär även rådgivning och metodstöd till övriga avdelningar avseende nya verktyg, utveckling och digitalisering.
 



  





 IT-miljön består av ca 400 datorer varav ca 100 student/studiodatorer, (endast Apple) samt Windows- och Linux-servrar. KMH har ett befintligt avtal med Sunet (Vetenskapsrådet) vilka levererar nätverk som tjänst. Arbetet på IT-avdelningen präglas av löpande IT-drift där utveckling av IT-verksamheten utgör en del av det dagliga arbetet.
 



  





 I dina arbetsuppgifter ingår planering och uppföljning av IT-verksamheten, budget och fakturahantering, IT-upphandlingar, IT-avtal och andra administrativa uppgifter. I arbetet ingår även att i samråd med IT-avdelningens medarbetare och högskolans ledning besluta om tekniska och strategiska vägval inom IT.
 



  
 



**Vi söker dig som har** 



* akademisk utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande för tjänsten relevanta kunskaper
* minst 3 års erfarenhet av arbete som IT-chef, IT-ledande funktion eller annan ledande befattning med personalansvar
* erfarenhet av och god kunskap om IT, IT-förvaltning, IT-säkerhet och IT-infrastruktur
* goda kunskaper om LOU och GDPR, med några års erfarenhet av upphandling och IT-avtal
* kunskaper inom macOS
* erfarenhet från arbete med IT-utveckling och digitalisering
* förmåga att uttrycka dig väl i både tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.



  
 



**Meriterande** 



* erfarenhet av Apple-miljö
* erfarenhet av arbete inom högskolesektorn.








**Personliga egenskaper** 




 Du är en inspirerande ledare, har ett kommunikativt ledarskap och en fallenhet för att coacha och inspirera medarbetare för att uppnå gemensamma mål och en positiv arbetsmiljö.
 



  





 I rollen som IT-chef är det även av vikt att du har en god förmåga att organisera och se helheter både på ett övergripande plan och på en operativ nivå samtidigt som du är beredd att sköta administrativa uppgifter.
 



 Du kan förmedla ny teknik till andra på ett pedagogiskt sätt och kan driva IT-utvecklingen framåt i syfte att förenkla eller förkorta arbetsprocesser.
 



  





 Du har förmåga att prioritera utifrån helhetsperspektiv.
 



  
 



 På KMH får du möjligheten att arbeta i en inspirerande miljö där teknik möter kreativitet. Som del av högskoleförvaltningens chefsgrupp bidrar du till att forma framtiden för en av världens mest anrika musikhögskolor.
 



  
 



 KMH kommer i denna rekrytering främst att beakta den som, efter en kvalitativ helhetsbedömning av förtjänst, skicklighet, personliga egenskaper och lämplighet, bedöms ha de bästa förutsättningarna att genomföra och utveckla aktuella arbetsuppgifter, och bidra till en positiv utveckling av verksamheten.
 



  
 



**Ytterligare information** 




 Kontaktuppgifter
 



 Högskoledirektör Kersti Hedqvist, kersti.hedqvist@kmh.se 08-5721031
 



 Fackliga representanter
 



 Saco-s - Karl Asp, karl.asp@kmh.se
 



 OFR/ST – Erik Metall, erik.metall@kmh.se
 



  





 Mer information om KMH finner du på www.kmh.se
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Välkommen att skicka din ansökan, cv och personligt brev, senast 2025-03-09, dnr 25/88.
 



  





 Du ansöker via KMH:s webbplats
 



 https://web103.reachmee.com/ext/I021/1854/job?site=6&lang=SE&validator=61ee85fe2b0ccd5078a6fd0c172e68d7&job\_id=126

title: IT Operations Lead
description:
About us:
   

  

 Leya is working to empower lawyers and automate legal work. Our approach is to enable the lawyer of the future: a human-AI lawyer who's an order of magnitude more effective than a team of conventional legal professionals. The human-AI lawyer will iterate at the speed of their judgment, even in the most complex legal scenarios, and will out-smart and out-deliver the best pure AI system.
   

  

 You are joining an early-stage scale-up with exceptional product-market fit that thousands of lawyers use daily at global institutions such as Bird&Bird, Mannheimer Swartling, and Heineken. Backed by $37M in funding from top investors like Benchmark, Redpoint, and Y Combinator, Leya is a group of exceptional engineers, lawyers, and doers. Here, you will have infinite room to grow and rethink how truly worthwhile work gets done.
   

  

 The role:
   

  

 We are looking for an experienced and proactive IT Operations Lead to take ownership of our internal IT operations and infrastructure. You will own IT infrastructure and operations in a fast-growing, international scale-up, working cross-functionally with leadership to ensure compliance, security, and operational excellence. Your responsibilities include managing IT operations, automating workflows, handling user lifecycle processes (onboarding/offboarding), overseeing hardware procurement and asset management, and optimizing SaaS procurement and budgeting. You’ll drive identity and access management (IAM), mobile device management (MDM), and administer key tools like Google Workspace and Slack. If you’re highly organized, solutions-focused, and thrive in fast-paced environments, we want to hear from you!
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Manage and optimize productivity platforms (Google Workspace, GitHub, Slack, Miro, Linear, etc.)
* Ensure employees have the necessary tools and systems while keeping costs efficient
* Automate workflows and integrate tools to eliminate unnecessary manual tasks
* Implement zero-touch onboarding/offboarding processes across all tools
* Oversee patch management, support, and configuration of laptops and mobile devices
* Manage identity and access management (IAM) and security protocols
* Maintain office technology, including internet, alarms, and meeting room setups
* Ensure policies and controls aligned with SOC2 and ISO standards are implemented and adhered to


 Who you are:
   

  

* Integrity: As the backbone of Leya’s IT operations, you will have access to critical systems and information. Trust, transparency, and accountability are essential.
* Diligent: You take full ownership of IT systems and processes, ensuring everything runs seamlessly.
* Autonomous: While working in a team, you lead with self-initiative, valuing feedback and focusing on solutions. You are proactive, innovative, and unafraid to take on new challenges.
* Entrepreneurial: Leya is a fast-growing scale-up. Things move quickly, and responsibilities evolve. You thrive in dynamic environments and are excited about shaping how IT supports a world-class AI-powered legal platform.


 Qualifications & Skills:
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in IT support, IT operations, or related roles
* Hands-on experience with IAM, MDM, and SaaS management, in cloud based companies
* Strong understanding of automation and workflow optimization
* Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously


 Preferred Qualifications:
   

  

* Experience working with SOC2 and ISO compliance
* Prior experience in a fast-growing startup or scale-up environment


 Practical Information:
   

  

* Career development opportunities in a rapidly evolving entrepreneurial environment.
* A collaborative, high-energy team environment where your ideas and contributions are valued and implemented.
* Competitive salary complemented with a transparent and highly competitive options program.
* Centrally located offices in Stockholm, designed as a space for you to do your life's work.


 We founded Leya with the vision of giving lawyers the tools they deserve.
   

  

 We didn't build Leya for how law is practiced today; we built it for how it should be practiced tomorrow.

title: Solution Manager
description:
**Bakgrund**
 Vi söker nu efter en Solution Manager. I rollen krävs det att du är engagerad och kunnig konsult som Solution Manager med fokus på Security som vill ta ansvar för att kravställning av IT-tjänster är i linje med kundens målarkitektur. I rollen även ingår ansvar för att tekniska lösningar och förutsättningar inom givet tjänsteområde följer vår kunds riktlinjer avseende tekniska -och säkerhetsmässiga krav.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden omfattar**
* Säkerställa att lösningar inom ditt tjänsteområde svarar upp mot ställda tekniska samt säkerhetsmässiga krav
* Delta i interna och/eller externa samverkansform för förvaltning av tjänsteleveransen, detta avser både samverkan med leverantörer och kundens verksamhet
* Ha kontroll över versioner och konfigurationer och bistå Service Manager i översynen att tjänsten livscykelhanteras och följer de säkerhetskrav som ställs på tjänsten
* Ha kontinuerlig interaktion med processorganisationen och är väl förtrogen med ITIL-ramverket och de krav som det ställer avseende lösningen
* Assisterar Service Manager och Vendor Manager vid arbete med SLA och OLA KPI
* Kravställa mot övervakning- och kapacitetsrapportering
* Bistå med kompetens vid tekniska riskanalyser
* Proaktivt identifiera relevanta utvecklingsområden/säkerhetslösningar och driva igenom dessa.
* Stötta pågående projekt som syftar till att stärka Bankgirots befintliga miljö


**Krav**
* Security Operations Center (SOC)
* Intrusion Detection and Prevention (IDS/IDP)
* Loggning – arkiv & analys
* Security Vulnerability Scanning (SVS)
* Compliance rapportering/granskning/uppföljning
* Härdning/Patchning
* Säkerhetsarkitektur
* EDR, SIEM & NDR


**Allmän kompetens och erfarenhet**
* Djup teknisk kunskap inom IT-säkerhetstjänstområdet
* Erfarenhet av förvaltning av IT-säkerhetstjänster
* Erfarenhet kring riskbedömningsarbete
* Erfarenhet från IT-leveranser baserad på ITIL
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat inom reglerad verksamhet
* Relevant akademisk examen eller motsvarande utbildning och erfarenhet inom relevant område


**Personliga egenskaper**
 Hos vår kund är trivseln och lojaliteten till uppdraget hög. Det är en stabil och mycket trevlig organisation som erbjuder fantastiska möjligheter till utveckling av såväl konsulten som samhället i stort. Konsulten drivs av att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö, bidra till att utveckla tjänsteområdet och driva lösningar och förbättringar. Konsulten har också god teknisk kunskap inom tjänsteområdet och arbetar strukturerat för att driva högkvalitativ utveckling. För att lyckas och trivas i rollen som Solution Manager behöver du ha en god kommunikations- och samarbetsförmåga och lägger stor vikt vid att bygga starka relationer.
   

  

**Period** 
 : beläggningsgrad på 100% till 2025-10-31 med option om förlängning.
   

  

**Tillträde** 
 : omgående eller enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

**Placering** 
 : Stockholm, Liljeholmen

title: IT Consultant - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Stockholm office, we are looking for IT Consultants who will collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on local and international client projects!
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

 You can help us make a difference if you
   

  

* have a degree in computer science, informatics, business with focus on IT, or a related field
* gathered approx. two years of relevant experience in IT consulting (part or full time)
* are no stranger to the buzzwords machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile, AI, and robotics
* enjoy tackling complex digital challenges and are enthusiastic about developing and sharing solutions
* feel comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts and are flexible and willing to travel
* are excellent at understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Shape the digital future of globally leading companies in an individual client context with overarching technical solutions
* Develop groundbreaking projects by enabling your clients to effectively use agile methods and modern approaches in the context of strategic IT implementation
* Smooth the path for tailored, future-oriented customer journeys based on precise analyses of the individual situation and with current market developments and trends such as machine learning in mind
* Design and optimize unique IT architectures within the framework of enterprise solution requirements, modern custom software developments, and sustainable digital solutions, including cyber resilience


 Additional info
   

  

 How to grow with us
   

  

 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*

title: Affärsutvecklare med Fokus på Tjänstedesign
description:
*Är du en tjänstedesigner som vill arbeta mer affärsnära? Eller en affärsutvecklare med en gedigen bakgrund inom tjänstedesign? Då kan du vara den perfekta kandidaten för oss!*
**Om jobbet**
 Vi söker en driven och engagerad Affärsutvecklare med starka förmågor inom tjänstedesign till vårt sammansvetsade team som tillsammans driver initiativ för att stärka LF´s helhetserbjudande tvärs affär. Du kommer att arbeta med att utveckla och implementera nya koncept och erbjudanden som träffar både kund och medarbetare. Du kommer att leda och driva målbildsarbeten som förenar kund- och affärsnytta, och du måste trivas med att jobba hela vägen från tidiga utforskande faser till genomförande- och implementeringsfaser. Avslutningsvis så trivs du med att stötta i en bred repertoar av frågor med många kontaktytor inom exempelvis affär, IT, juridik, marknadsföring, analys etc.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden inkluderar:
   

  

* Delta i projekt och driva initiativ som stödjer gruppens uppdrag - att arbeta tvärs affär.
* Ta fram agerbara insikter kopplade till kund- och medarbetarbehov baserat på kvalitativa och kvantitativa data.
* Utveckla prototyper och koncept på lösningar som förenar användarnytta med affärsnytta.
* Ansvara för användartester och upplägg av pilotstudier.
* Facilitera workshops som syftar till att förena många intressenter kring komplexa och gemensamma lösningar.
* Koordinera, sammanställa och presentera material till olika beslutande forum och grupperingar.


**Vem är du?**
 För att bli framgångsrik i den här rollen ser vi att du har:
   

  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som tjänstedesigner eller liknande roll under 4–6 år. Har du även en bakgrund inom andra roller eller yrken, såsom affärsutveckling eller managementkonsult är det meriterande.
* En relevant akademisk bakgrund.
* Hög kompetens inom Design Research och framtagning av agerbara kundinsikter med stöd av såväl kvalitativ som kvantitativ analys.
* Förmåga att driva idégenerering, prototypframställning och konceptualisering.
* Erfarenhet av att testa och iterera på koncept utifrån en mix av olika metoder.
* Stark förmåga och praktisk erfarenhet av att facilitera workshops.
* Starka färdigheter i kommunikation och storytelling, både skriftligt och muntligt.


 Meriterande:
   

  

* God förståelse för teknik, innovation och digitala trender och hur det påverkar kundinteraktioner.
* Hög analytisk förmåga och kapacitet att se den större bilden.
* Strukturerad, pedagogisk och kommunikativ i ditt arbetssätt.
* Förmåga att skapa engagemang, bygga förtroende och relationer.
* Erfarenhet av att hitta vägar framåt i en större komplex organisation med många intressenter.


 Som person är du en pragmatisk och empatisk lagspelare som trivs i samarbete med andra. Du är prestigelös, driven och engagerad, och bidrar med ditt perspektiv samtidigt som du tar till dig av andras. Du är lösningsorienterad, blickar ständigt framåt och inspirerar med din positiva attityd. Du har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i komplexa utmaningar och leverera resultat med ditt strategiska och analytiska tänkande. Avslutningsvis har du god förståelse för vikten av ett datadrivet förhållningssätt där kundbehov och affärsnytta förenas med ett starkt fokus på genomförbarhet.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Välkommen till Affärsenhet Sak inom Länsförsäkringar AB. Vi utvecklar sakförsäkringsaffären och driver ny affär.
